          %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%R@H%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@a%r@l%r@o%r@g%r@y%r@:%r@ %r@“%R@G%r@o%r@d%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@v%r@o%r@l%r@v%r@e%r@m%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@k%r@i%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@(%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@d%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@)%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@a%r@l%r@o%r@g%r@o%r@u%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@w%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@e%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@u%r@s%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@d%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@l%r@e%r@e%r@p%r@,%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@e%r@u%r@d%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@,%r@ %r@p%r@l%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@c%r@r%r@a%r@b%r@ %r@g%r@r%r@a%r@s%r@s%r@ %r@r%r@i%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@ %r@n%r@e%r@x%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@e%r@a%r@t%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@o%r@k%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@f%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@6%R@W%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@a%r@l%r@k%r@s%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@a%r@c%r@h%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@t%r@u%r@r%r@i%r@t%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@c%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@p%r@p%r@a%r@r%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@s%r@o%r@ %r@c%r@r%r@a%r@b%r@ %r@g%r@r%r@a%r@s%r@s%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@7%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@w%r@n%r@e%r@r%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@k%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@,%r@%vn~
      %r@“%r@‘%R@S%r@i%r@r%r@,%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@d%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@ %r@u%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@w%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@e%r@l%r@d%r@?%r@ %R@W%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@’%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@c%r@r%r@a%r@b%r@ %r@g%r@r%r@a%r@s%r@s%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@?%r@’%r@%vn~
          %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@8%r@”%R@H%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@s%r@w%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@T%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@g%r@u%r@y%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@f%r@e%r@u%r@d%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@!%r@’%r@%vn~
      %r@“%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@k%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@i%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@O%r@k%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@,%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@u%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@.%r@ %R@D%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@u%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@ %r@g%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@?%r@’%r@%vn~
          %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@9%r@”%R@H%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@s%r@w%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@N%r@o%r@,%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@,%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@r%r@o%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@e%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@r%r@a%r@b%r@ %r@g%r@r%r@a%r@s%r@s%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@0%R@L%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@b%r@o%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@ %r@g%r@r%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@o%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@i%r@d%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@a%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@u%r@n%r@t%r@i%r@l%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@r%r@v%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@i%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@r%r@v%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@i%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@s%r@,%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@r%r@v%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@F%r@i%r@r%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@g%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@r%r@a%r@b%r@ %r@g%r@r%r@a%r@s%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@t%r@o%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@n%r@d%r@l%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@r%r@n%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@.%r@ %R@C%r@o%r@l%r@l%r@e%r@c%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@e%r@a%r@t%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@u%r@g%r@h%r@,%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@l%r@o%r@.%r@’%r@”%r@%vn~
          %u@3%u@1He told them another analogy: %r@“%R@G%r@o%r@d%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@a%r@c%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@k%r@i%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@(%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@d%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@)%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@a%r@l%r@o%r@g%r@o%r@u%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@m%r@u%r@s%r@t%r@a%r@r%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@o%r@k%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@p%r@l%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@e%r@l%r@d%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%R@W%r@h%r@i%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@m%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@d%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@u%r@l%r@l%r@-%r@g%r@r%r@o%r@w%r@n%r@,%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@i%r@g%r@g%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@c%r@r%r@o%r@p%r@-%r@y%r@i%r@e%r@l%r@d%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@p%r@l%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@e%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@i%r@r%r@d%r@s%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@n%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@r%r@a%r@n%r@c%r@h%r@e%r@s%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~
          %u@3%u@3He told them another analogy: %r@“%R@G%r@o%r@d%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@a%r@c%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@k%r@i%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@a%r@l%r@o%r@g%r@o%r@u%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@p%r@a%r@c%r@k%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@e%r@a%r@s%r@t%r@,%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@m%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@i%r@m%r@b%r@e%r@d%r@d%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@e%r@p%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@b%r@a%r@t%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@u%r@g%r@h%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@o%r@u%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@u%r@p%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@s%r@h%r@e%r@l%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@z%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@i%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@u%r@n%r@t%r@i%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@a%r@t%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@f%r@e%r@r%r@m%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@.%r@”%vn~
          %u@3%u@4Jesus spoke all these things to the crowd by way of parables, and he didn’t say anything apart from using a parable, %u@3%u@5so that the Psalm would be fulfilled,%vn~
%si~
I will open my mouth by means of analogy.%vp~
I will pour out of it%vp~
That which has been hidden from the beginning of time.%u@%vp~
%si~
          %u@3%u@6Then he let the crowds go home. His disciples went up to him and asked, “Explain to us the parable of the field’s crab grass.” %u@3%u@7He told them, %r@“%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@w%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@M%r@a%r@n%r@,%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@8%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@e%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@l%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@l%r@l%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@a%r@f%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@r%r@a%r@b%r@ %r@g%r@r%r@a%r@s%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@l%r@l%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@E%r@v%r@i%r@l%r@ %R@O%r@n%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@9%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@f%r@e%r@u%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@D%r@e%r@v%r@i%r@l%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@r%r@v%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@n%r@s%r@u%r@m%r@m%r@a%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@g%r@e%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@r%r@v%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@g%r@e%r@l%r@s%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@0%R@S%r@o%r@ %r@j%r@u%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@r%r@a%r@b%r@ %r@g%r@r%r@a%r@s%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@n%r@d%r@l%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@c%r@i%r@n%r@e%r@r%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@r%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@y%r@           %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@”%R@G%r@o%r@d%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@a%r@c%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@k%r@i%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@(%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@d%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@)%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@a%r@l%r@o%r@g%r@o%r@u%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@b%r@o%r@x%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@e%r@a%r@s%r@u%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@r%r@i%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@p%r@l%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@l%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@u%r@m%r@b%r@l%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@c%r@r%r@o%r@s%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@u%r@n%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@h%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@j%r@o%r@y%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@s%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@w%r@n%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@y%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@p%r@l%r@o%r@t%r@.%r@%vn~
          %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%r@”%R@Y%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@g%r@a%r@i%r@n%r@,%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@a%r@c%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@k%r@i%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@a%r@l%r@o%r@g%r@o%r@u%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@a%r@l%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@l%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@6%r@w%r@h%r@o%r@,%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@u%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@x%r@t%r@r%r@e%r@m%r@e%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@v%r@a%r@l%r@u%r@a%r@b%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@l%r@,%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@w%r@n%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@b%r@o%r@u%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@.%r@%vn~
          %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@7%r@”%R@Y%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@g%r@a%r@i%r@n%r@,%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@a%r@c%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@s%r@h%r@,%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@8%r@w%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@f%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@,%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@u%r@l%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@h%r@o%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@m%r@p%r@t%r@i%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@t%r@o%r@ %r@d%r@r%r@y%r@ %r@l%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@.%r@ %R@T%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@o%r@k%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@r%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@s%r@h%r@,%r@ %r@p%r@u%r@t%r@t%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@n%r@t%r@a%r@i%r@n%r@e%r@r%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@r%r@e%r@w%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@9%R@T%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@E%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@n%r@a%r@l%r@ %R@G%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@:%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@g%r@e%r@l%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@s%r@p%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@r%r@e%r@c%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@p%r@i%r@c%r@k%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@m%r@o%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@s%r@h%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@a%r@m%r@o%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@s%r@h%r@,%r@ %r@g%r@e%r@t%r@t%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@s%r@h%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@0%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@r%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@t%r@o%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@b%r@l%r@a%r@z%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@-%r@h%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@f%r@u%r@r%r@n%r@a%r@c%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@e%r@p%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@g%r@n%r@a%r@s%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@e%r@t%r@h%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~
          %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@”%R@D%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@u%r@n%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@t%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@?%r@”%r@%vn~
      They then tell him, “yes.”%vn~
          %u@5%u@2He told them, %r@“%R@F%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@a%r@s%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@S%r@c%r@r%r@i%r@b%r@e%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@s%r@i%r@g%r@n%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@a%r@c%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@s%r@c%r@i%r@p%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@d%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@a%r@g%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@l%r@a%r@r%r@g%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@s%r@t%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@e%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@v%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@m%r@e%r@m%r@b%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@r%r@i%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@o%r@r%r@a%r@g%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@p%r@u%r@l%r@l%r@s%r@ %r@n%r@e%r@w%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@u%r@f%r@f%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@o%r@r%r@a%r@g%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@n%r@e%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@i%r@s%r@e%r@s%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~
          %u@5%u@3And when Jesus came to the end of speaking these parables, he left that place. %u@5%u@4After he arrived at the place where his kinfolk lived, he taught them in the local synagogue, resulting in them being astonished and going about saying,%vn~
      “’Where’d this guy get this here wisdom and the miracles? %u@5%u@5Isn’t this guy the craftsman’s son? Isn’t his mother the one called Mary and aren’t his brothers James, Joseph, Simon, and Judas? %u@5%u@6And his sisters—don’t they all live around here? Just where did he get all this from?’”%vn~
          %u@5%u@7And they got all bent out of shape about him. Jesus said to them, %r@“%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@y%r@ %r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@p%r@l%r@a%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@o%r@p%r@h%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@s%r@h%r@o%r@n%r@o%r@r%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@e%r@x%r@c%r@e%r@p%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@m%r@o%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@n%r@f%r@o%r@l%r@k%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@t%r@o%r@w%r@n%r@.%r@” %u@5%u@8He didn’t do a lot of miracles there because of their refusal to believe.%vn~
%sb~
Matthew Chapter 14%hb~
          %u@1In that timeframe, Governor Herod got a report about Jesus. %u@2He said to all those around him, “This is John the Baptist. He’s been raised from the dead, and that explains how he can work these miracles.” %u@3You see, on account of Herodias, his brother Phillip’s wife, Herod arrested John, bound him, and put him away in jail. %u@4This was because John kept on telling him, “It’s not lawful for you to be married to her.” %u@5Though wanting to kill him, he feared the masses, because they considered him to be a prophet. %u@6On Herod’s birthday, Herodias’s daughter performed a dance in front of everyone, %u@7resulting in him making an oath promising that he’d give her anything she asked for. %u@8Her mother nudged her to say, “Give me John the Baptist’s head on a platter.” %u@9The king became deeply upset because of the oath that he made in front of all his guests. He ordered that the request be granted, %u@1%u@0and he sent for John to be beheaded in jail. %u@1%u@1His head was brought on a platter and was given to the teenage girl, and she presented it to her mother. %u@1%u@2His disciples went there and took away his body, buried him, and went and told Jesus what had happened.%vn~
          %u@1%u@3After Jesus heard about this, he left from there by boat to go some place out in the sticks to be alone. When the crowd heard, they followed him on foot from the cities. %u@1%u@4He went out and saw the great crowd and felt a deep inner compassion for them and cured all those who weren’t well. %u@1%u@5When it got late, his disciples came to him and said,%vn~
      “We’re out in the middle of nowhere, and it’s getting late. Dismiss the crowds so that they can venture out to the marketplaces in the surrounding towns and pick up something to eat.”%vn~
          %u@1%u@6Jesus replied, %r@“%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@ %r@n%r@e%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@s%r@m%r@i%r@s%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@—%r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@g%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@e%r@a%r@t%r@.%r@”%vn~
          %u@1%u@7They then said, “We don’t have anything here except for five loaves of bread and two fishes.”%vn~
          %u@1%u@8He said, %r@“%R@B%r@r%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@.%r@”%vn~
          %u@1%u@9He had everyone in the crowd find a nice spot on the grass to relax. He took the five loaves and the two fishes, he looked up in the sky, gave thanks, broke the bread and gave it to his disciples. %u@2%u@0Everyone ate and ate until they were full. They took away the leftover pieces of bread and filled up twelve baskets with them. %u@2%u@1Of those who had been fed, there were five thousand men, not including women and children.%vn~
          %u@2%u@2Wasting no time, he urged his disciples to climb into a boat and go out ahead of him to the other side, while he, meanwhile, would dismiss the crowd. %u@2%u@3After he dismissed the crowd, he went by himself up a mountain to pray. When evening arrived, he was up there alone. %u@2%u@4The boat had already gotten more than a few miles away from shore, where it was being harassed by the waves, since there was a headwind. %u@2%u@5Around four or five in the morning, he went towards them walking on the water. %u@2%u@6When the disciples saw him walking on the water, they were startled and shouted, “There’s a ghost out there!”. %u@2%u@7Immediately Jesus said to them, %r@“%R@R%r@e%r@l%r@a%r@x%r@,%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@f%r@r%r@a%r@i%r@d%r@.%r@”%r@ %u@2%u@8So Peter replied, “Lord, if it’s you, order me to come to you on the water.” %u@2%u@9Jesus said, “Come.” Peter got out of the boat and walked on water and went towards Jesus. %u@3%u@0Seeing the strong wind, he got scared and started to sink and shouted, “Lord, help, save me!” %u@3%u@1Immediately Jesus reached his hand out and got ahold of him and said, %r@“%R@L%r@i%r@t%r@t%r@l%r@e%r@-%r@f%r@a%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@-%r@e%r@r%r@,%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@y%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@d%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@u%r@b%r@t%r@?%r@”%r@ %u@3%u@2After they got into the boat, the wind died down. %u@3%u@3Those in the boat bowed down low in homage before him saying, “You really are God’s son.”%vn~
          %u@3%u@4Having crossed over, they landed at Gennesaret. %u@3%u@5The men from that area, recognizing him, sent the word out to the entire surrounding area, and they brought to him everyone who wasn’t well. %u@3%u@6They were begging him, again and again, that they just be allowed to touch the edge of his shawl, and everybody who touched it became completely well.%vn~
%sb~
Matthew Chapter 15%hb~
          %u@1Then some Pharisees and designated teachers from Jerusalem arrived saying, %u@2”What’s the reason that your disciples disregard the rituals which have been handed down to us over the years, seeing that they don’t ceremonially wash their hands before eating?” %u@3Jesus answered them, %r@“%R@W%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@a%r@s%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@s%r@r%r@e%r@g%r@a%r@r%r@d%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@m%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@m%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@b%r@y%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@a%r@n%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@s%r@u%r@p%r@p%r@o%r@r%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@m%r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@’%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@‘%R@L%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@b%r@a%r@d%r@-%r@m%r@o%r@u%r@t%r@h%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@m%r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@.%r@’%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%R@B%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@W%r@h%r@o%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@y%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@m%r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@T%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@p%r@a%r@y%r@m%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@b%r@l%r@i%r@g%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@s%r@i%r@g%r@n%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@f%r@e%r@r%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@,%r@’%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@6%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@o%r@k%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@n%r@d%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@f%r@u%r@n%r@d%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@.%r@’%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@7%R@H%r@y%r@p%r@o%r@c%r@r%r@i%r@t%r@e%r@s%r@—%R@I%r@s%r@a%r@i%r@a%r@h%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@%si~
%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@8%r@”%R@T%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@o%r@p%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@n%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@i%r@r%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@p%r@s%r@,%r@%vp~

%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@9%R@I%r@n%r@ %r@v%r@a%r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@s%r@h%r@i%r@p%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@,%r@%vp~
%R@F%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@a%r@c%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@a%r@c%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@m%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@m%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@s%r@.%r@”%r@%vp~
%si~
          %u@1%u@0He summoned the crowd and said, %r@“%R@L%r@i%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@—%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@i%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@o%r@u%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@f%r@i%r@l%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@o%r@n%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@o%r@u%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@f%r@i%r@l%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@o%r@n%r@.%r@” %u@1%u@2Then his disciples went over to him and said, “Did you know that the Pharisees were offended by what you said?” %u@1%u@3He came back with a response and said, %r@“%R@E%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@ %r@p%r@l%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@l%r@y%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@d%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@p%r@l%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@a%r@n%r@k%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%R@L%r@e%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@:%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@u%r@i%r@d%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@d%r@;%r@ %r@b%r@o%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@t%r@c%r@h%r@.%r@” %u@1%u@5Peter answered him, “Explain that analogy you just used to us.” %u@1%u@6He said, %r@“%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@g%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@,%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@?%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@7%R@D%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@k%r@n%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@o%r@u%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@p%r@a%r@s%r@s%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@r%r@o%r@u%r@g%r@h%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@o%r@m%r@a%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@e%r@n%r@d%r@s%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@i%r@l%r@e%r@t%r@?%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@8%R@T%r@h%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@o%r@u%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@f%r@i%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@o%r@n%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@9%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@m%r@m%r@o%r@r%r@a%r@l%r@i%r@t%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@l%r@y%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@,%r@ %r@s%r@l%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@…%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@0%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@f%r@i%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@o%r@n%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@c%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@m%r@o%r@n%r@i%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@s%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@f%r@o%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@a%r@t%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@f%r@i%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@o%r@n%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~
          %u@2%u@1Jesus left there and departed for the regions of Tyre and Sidon. %u@2%u@2Out of nowhere, a Canaanite woman from that area came by and shouted, “Have mercy on me, sir, you wonderful man. My daughter is severely demon-possessed.” %u@2%u@3He didn’t say a word to her. His disciples went over to him and started saying, “Get rid of her.”%vn~
          %u@2%u@4He replied to her, %r@“%R@I%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@w%r@n%r@-%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@-%r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %R@I%r@s%r@r%r@a%r@e%r@l%r@.”%vn~
          %u@2%u@5So she came and prostrated herself in front of him and said, “Help me, sir.” %vn~
          %u@2%u@6Jesus replied, %r@“%R@I%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@r%r@i%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@a%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@C%r@h%r@i%r@l%r@d%r@r%r@e%r@n%r@’%r@s%r@ %R@B%r@r%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@g%r@s%r@.%r@”%vn~
          %u@2%u@7She said, “Yes, but also, sir: the dogs are fed by the scraps which their masters drop from their tables.”%vn~
          %u@2%u@8Then this produced a response with Jesus; he said, %r@“%R@W%r@o%r@w%r@,%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@h%r@u%r@g%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@l%r@a%r@d%r@y%r@!%r@ %R@A%r@s%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@s%r@i%r@r%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@p%r@p%r@e%r@n%r@.%r@”%vn~
      …And her daughter was healed that moment.%vn~
          %u@2%u@9Returning from there Jesus went to the Sea of Galilee, and took a seat up in a hill that is alongside it. %u@3%u@0A large crowd approached him, bringing with them their lame, blind, maimed, deaf & dumb, and many other such, and they laid them at his feet (i.e., they submitted them to his care), and he healed them, %u@3%u@1to the degree that the crowd was awe-struck in seeing the deaf & dumb speak, the maimed become well, the lame walk, and the blind seeing. And they glorified the God of Israel.%vn~
          %u@3%u@2Now Jesus summoned his disciples and said, %r@“%R@I%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@e%r@p%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@p%r@a%r@s%r@s%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@r%r@o%r@w%r@d%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@c%r@a%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@’%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@r%r@e%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@a%r@y%r@s%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@y%r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@e%r@a%r@t%r@.%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@s%r@m%r@i%r@s%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@ %r@h%r@u%r@n%r@g%r@r%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@p%r@a%r@s%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@i%r@p%r@ %r@b%r@a%r@c%r@k%r@.%r@”%r@ %u@3%u@3His disciples chimed in,%vn~
      “Where in the middle of nowhere can we get all the bread needed to fill up such a large crowd?”%vn~
          %u@3%u@4Jesus continued and said, “How much bread do you have?”%vn~
      They said, “Seven loaves plus a little bit of fish.”%vn~
          %u@3%u@5He told the crowd to find a nice spot on the ground to relax on. %u@3%u@6He took the seven loaves and the fish, gave thanks, broke the bread, and gave it to his disciples. %u@3%u@7All of them ate until they were stuffed. They gathered up the leftover scraps and filled up seven baskets with them. %u@3%u@8There were four thousand men eating there that day—this doesn’t include women and children. %u@3%u@9He dismissed the crowd, got into a boat, and went to the Magadan region.%vn~
%sb~
Matthew Chapter 16%hb~
          %u@1The Pharisees and Sadducees came by. Testing him, they asked him to perform a spectacular miracle on the spot. %u@2He delivered an answer to them, %r@“%R@A%r@t%r@ %r@s%r@u%r@n%r@s%r@e%r@t%r@,%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@y%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@A%r@h%r@…%r@g%r@o%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@—%r@s%r@i%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@k%r@y%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@d%r@’%r@;%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@s%r@u%r@n%r@r%r@i%r@s%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@A%r@h%r@…%r@d%r@r%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@d%r@a%r@y%r@—%r@s%r@i%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@k%r@y%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@d%r@.%r@’%r@ %R@A%r@l%r@t%r@h%r@o%r@u%r@g%r@h%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@k%r@n%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@f%r@f%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@i%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@f%r@f%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@p%r@a%r@t%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@n%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@k%r@y%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@l%r@o%r@r%r@,%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@f%r@f%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@i%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@i%r@r%r@a%r@c%r@l%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@g%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@a%r@s%r@o%r@n%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@i%r@l%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@p%r@o%r@s%r@t%r@a%r@s%r@y%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@e%r@v%r@a%r@i%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %R@Z%r@e%r@i%r@t%r@g%r@e%r@i%r@s%r@t%r@!%r@ %R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@m%r@i%r@r%r@a%r@c%r@l%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@?%r@ %R@N%r@o%r@ %r@m%r@i%r@r%r@a%r@c%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@r%r@f%r@o%r@r%r@m%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@e%r@x%r@c%r@e%r@p%r@t%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %R@J%r@o%r@n%r@a%r@h%r@’%r@s%r@ %R@M%r@i%r@r%r@a%r@c%r@l%r@e%r@”… And he excused himself and departed.%vn~
          %u@5When they crossed over to the next district, the disciples forgot to take bread along with them. %u@6Jesus said to them, %r@“%R@L%r@o%r@o%r@k%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@P%r@h%r@a%r@r%r@i%r@s%r@e%r@e%r@s%r@’%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %R@S%r@a%r@d%r@d%r@u%r@c%r@e%r@e%r@s%r@’%r@ %r@y%r@e%r@a%r@s%r@t%r@.%r@”%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@7%R@S%r@o%r@ %r@a%r@m%r@o%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@s%r@e%r@l%r@v%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@i%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@g%r@a%r@i%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@g%r@a%r@i%r@n%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@g%r@u%r@r%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@,%r@ %r@“%R@W%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@d%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@a%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@y%r@ %r@b%r@r%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@.%r@” %u@8Jesus, aware of this, said, %r@“%R@W%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@g%r@u%r@r%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@m%r@o%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@s%r@e%r@l%r@v%r@e%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@t%r@t%r@l%r@e%r@-%r@f%r@a%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@-%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@—%r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@y%r@ %r@b%r@r%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@?%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@9%R@H%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@n%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@m%r@e%r@m%r@b%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@u%r@s%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@y%r@ %r@b%r@a%r@s%r@k%r@e%r@t%r@f%r@u%r@l%r@s%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@p%r@i%r@c%r@k%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@?%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@0%R@N%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@u%r@s%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@y%r@ %r@b%r@a%r@s%r@k%r@e%r@t%r@f%r@u%r@l%r@s%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@p%r@i%r@c%r@k%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@? %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%R@H%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@d%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@g%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@,%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@i%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@L%r@o%r@o%r@k%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@P%r@h%r@a%r@r%r@i%r@s%r@e%r@e%r@s%r@’%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %R@S%r@a%r@d%r@d%r@u%r@c%r@e%r@e%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@y%r@e%r@a%r@s%r@t%r@,%r@’%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@s%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@b%r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@b%r@r%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@?%r@” %u@1%u@2Then they finally understood that he wasn’t telling them to beware of bread yeast but to beware of the Pharisees’ and Sadducees’ teaching.%vn~
          %u@1%u@3Having arrived in the parts of Caesarea Philippi, he asked his disciples,%vn~
      %r@“%R@W%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@o%r@p%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@M%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@?%r@”%r@%vn~
          %u@1%u@4They replied, “Some, John the Baptist, others Elijah, still others Jeremiah or one of the prophets.”%vn~
          %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%r@”%R@W%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@a%r@m%r@?%r@”%vn~
          %u@1%u@6Simon Peter replied, “You are the Messiah, the Son of the Living God.”%vn~
          %u@1%u@7Jesus came up with a reply and said to him, %r@“%R@H%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@v%r@o%r@r%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@F%r@u%r@l%r@l%r@-%R@T%r@h%r@r%r@o%r@t%r@t%r@l%r@e%r@’%r@ %R@S%r@i%r@m%r@o%r@n%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@c%r@a%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@d%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@r%r@o%r@u%r@g%r@h%r@ %r@h%r@u%r@m%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@d%r@u%r@c%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@r%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@a%r@l%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@b%r@y%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@l%r@y%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@8%R@N%r@o%r@w%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@r%r@o%r@c%r@k%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@r%r@o%r@c%r@k%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@i%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %R@F%r@o%r@l%r@l%r@o%r@w%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@u%r@r%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@f%r@e%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@9%R@A%r@n%r@d%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@g%r@r%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@a%r@c%r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@d%r@o%r@m%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@u%r@t%r@h%r@o%r@r%r@i%r@t%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@a%r@c%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@h%r@a%r@l%r@f%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@d%r@o%r@m%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@b%r@i%r@l%r@i%r@t%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@u%r@m%r@m%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@o%r@w%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@d%r@o%r@m%r@.%r@”%r@ %u@2%u@0Then he unequivocally ordered them not to tell anyone that he is the Messiah.%vn~
          %u@2%u@1Starting then, Jesus began to go about showing his disciples that he must travel to Jerusalem in order to suffer greatly at the hands of the national councilmen, Chief Priests, and designated teachers, to be put to death, and to be resurrected on the third day. %u@2%u@2Peter button-holed him and began to get on his case, “Oh, dear God! Lord! No way!” %u@2%u@3Jesus snapped back at Peter, %r@“%R@T%r@a%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@k%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@m%r@i%r@n%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %R@S%r@a%r@t%r@a%r@n%r@!%r@ %R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@r%r@r%r@i%r@t%r@a%r@t%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@c%r@a%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@v%r@v%r@y%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@j%r@u%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@.%r@”%r@ %u@2%u@4Then Jesus said to his disciples, %r@“%R@W%r@h%r@o%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@s%r@h%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@l%r@l%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@o%r@t%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@p%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@r%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@s%r@a%r@v%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@s%r@e%r@l%r@f%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@p%r@i%r@c%r@k%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@c%r@r%r@o%r@s%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@l%r@l%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@c%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@k%r@e%r@e%r@p%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@—%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@v%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@—%r@s%r@a%r@f%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@r%r@o%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@r%r@o%r@y%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@v%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@c%r@c%r@o%r@u%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@6%R@J%r@u%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@n%r@e%r@f%r@i%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@f%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@g%r@a%r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@o%r@c%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@v%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@?%r@ %R@O%r@r%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@g%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@e%r@x%r@c%r@h%r@a%r@n%r@g%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@w%r@n%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@?%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@7%R@F%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@M%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@j%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@y%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@m%r@i%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@c%r@c%r@o%r@m%r@p%r@a%r@n%r@i%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@b%r@y%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@g%r@e%r@l%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@e%r@a%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@c%r@c%r@o%r@r%r@d%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@8%R@I%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@—%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@’%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@o%r@p%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@a%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@s%r@p%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@a%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@u%r@n%r@t%r@i%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@p%r@p%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@M%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@s%r@u%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@m%r@i%r@n%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@.%r@”%vn~
%sb~
Matthew Chapter 17%hb~
          %u@1Six days later, Jesus went up a high mountain, bringing along with him Peter, James, and his brother John—those four alone. %u@2He was metamorphosed in front of them, and his face shined like the sun, and his clothing became as bright as the full light of day. %u@3And—like that—Moses and Elijah were seen talking with him. %u@4Peter exclaimed to Jesus, “Lord, it’s a good thing we’re here. If you’d like, I’ll build three little holy edifices to house them here, one for you, one for Moses, and one for Elijah.” %u@5A cloud appeared abruptly while he was still in the middle of talking, engulfing them in its shadow, and just as abruptly a voice spoke from out of the cloud saying, “This here is my Beloved Son, in whom I’m quite pleased. Listen to him again and again.” %u@6Once the disciples heard the voice, they fell flat on their faces and became really scared. %u@7Jesus went to them, touched them, and said, %r@“%R@R%r@i%r@s%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@f%r@r%r@a%r@i%r@d%r@.%r@”%r@ %u@8When they opened their eyes, they didn’t see anything except for Jesus back to normal and by himself again.%vn~
          %u@9While they were going down the mountain, Jesus commanded them, %r@“%R@D%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@y%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@b%r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@v%r@i%r@s%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@u%r@n%r@t%r@i%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@M%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@r%r@a%r@i%r@s%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@.%r@” %u@1%u@0The disciples asked him, “So now, why do the designated teachers say that Elijah must come first, before everything else happens?” %u@1%u@1He retorted, %r@“%R@T%r@r%r@u%r@e%r@,%r@ %R@E%r@l%r@i%r@j%r@a%r@h%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@r%r@i%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@g%r@a%r@i%r@n%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%R@B%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %R@E%r@l%r@i%r@j%r@a%r@h%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@r%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@y%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@d%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@c%r@k%r@n%r@o%r@w%r@l%r@e%r@d%r@g%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@x%r@t%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@i%r@r%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@i%r@l%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@s%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@s%r@i%r@r%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@r%r@m%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@.%r@ %R@I%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@M%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@s%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@u%r@f%r@f%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@i%r@r%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@s%r@.%r@” %u@1%u@3It was then that the disciples understood that he was talking to them about John the Baptist.%vn~
          %u@1%u@4When he got back to the crowd, a man came up to him kneeling in front of him %u@1%u@5saying, “Sir, have pity on my son since he’s epileptic and suffers badly. You see, one moment he’s having a seizure and the next moment he’s back to normal again. %u@1%u@6I brought him to your disciples, and they weren’t able to cure him.” %u@1%u@7Jesus, in his reaction, answered, %r@“%R@O%r@h%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@s%r@b%r@e%r@l%r@i%r@e%r@f%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@r%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %R@Z%r@e%r@i%r@t%r@g%r@e%r@i%r@s%r@t%r@!%r@ %R@J%r@u%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@k%r@e%r@e%r@p%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@l%r@d%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@?%r@ %R@J%r@u%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@p%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@?%r@ %R@B%r@r%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@.%r@” %u@1%u@8Jesus dropped the hammer on him, the demon came out of him, and the child was treated that moment. %u@1%u@9While they were alone, his disciples came over to him and asked, “What’s the reason why we couldn’t cast it out on our own?” %u@2%u@0Engaging them, he said, %r@“%R@B%r@e%r@c%r@a%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@t%r@t%r@l%r@e%r@-%r@f%r@a%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@.%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@u%r@s%r@t%r@a%r@r%r@d%r@-%r@s%r@e%r@e%r@d%r@-%r@f%r@a%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@,%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@o%r@u%r@n%r@t%r@a%r@i%r@n%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@P%r@i%r@c%r@k%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@s%r@e%r@l%r@f%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@ %r@o%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@,%r@’%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@ %r@o%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@.%r@ %R@N%r@o%r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@m%r@p%r@o%r@s%r@s%r@i%r@b%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@.%r@”%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%vn~
          %u@2%u@2Wrapping it up in Galilee, Jesus said to them, %r@“%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@M%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@a%r@k%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@t%r@o%r@ %r@c%r@u%r@s%r@t%r@o%r@d%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@r%r@d%r@ %r@d%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@r%r@i%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@.%r@”%r@ And they became quite sad.%vn~
          %u@2%u@4When he got to Capernaum, the collectors of the annual temple fee paid Peter a visit and said, “Your teacher hasn’t paid this year’s temple fee yet.” %u@2%u@5Peter took note of the comment and said “Ok” and went into the house. Anticipating him, Jesus said to him, %r@“%R@W%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@k%r@,%r@ %R@S%r@i%r@m%r@o%r@n%r@?%r@ %R@F%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@r%r@u%r@l%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@o%r@u%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@v%r@y%r@ %r@f%r@e%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@a%r@x%r@e%r@s%r@?%r@ %R@F%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@i%r@r%r@ %r@c%r@r%r@o%r@n%r@i%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@?%r@” %u@2%u@6Peter answered, “From others.” Jesus then said, %r@“%R@A%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@s%r@u%r@l%r@t%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@i%r@r%r@ %r@c%r@r%r@o%r@n%r@i%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@x%r@e%r@m%r@p%r@t%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@7%R@B%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@k%r@e%r@e%r@p%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@g%r@e%r@t%r@t%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@s%r@h%r@a%r@p%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@u%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@a%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@s%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@r%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@a%r@,%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@e%r@l%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@r%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@s%r@h%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@t%r@a%r@k%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@a%r@i%r@t%r@.%r@ %R@O%r@p%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@s%r@ %r@m%r@o%r@u%r@t%r@h%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@l%r@a%r@r%r@g%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@i%r@n%r@.%r@ %R@T%r@a%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@l%r@l%r@e%r@c%r@t%r@o%r@r%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@p%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@f%r@e%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@.%r@”%vn~
%sb~
Matthew Chapter 18%hb~
          %u@1Around that time Jesus’s disciples came to him saying, “So now, who’s the greatest in the kingdom of heaven?” %u@2He called a child over and stood him in the midst of them %u@3and said, %r@“%R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@a%r@l%r@,%r@ %r@i%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@h%r@a%r@n%r@g%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@h%r@i%r@l%r@d%r@l%r@i%r@k%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@e%r@n%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@d%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@f%r@o%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@a%r@b%r@a%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@s%r@e%r@l%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@c%r@h%r@i%r@l%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@r%r@e%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@d%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%R@A%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@c%r@e%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@u%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@c%r@h%r@i%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@h%r@a%r@l%r@f%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@c%r@e%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@6%R@W%r@h%r@o%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@i%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@i%r@p%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@d%r@r%r@a%r@w%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@t%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@n%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@o%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@s%r@i%r@g%r@n%r@i%r@f%r@i%r@c%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@l%r@i%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@t%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@f%r@ %r@i%r@f%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@f%r@t%r@ %r@s%r@u%r@n%r@k%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@i%r@d%r@d%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@c%r@e%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@m%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@s%r@t%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@r%r@a%r@p%r@p%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@n%r@e%r@c%r@k%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@7%R@W%r@o%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@r%r@v%r@e%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@s%r@u%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@a%r@p%r@s%r@.%r@ %R@W%r@h%r@i%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@u%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@a%r@p%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@e%r@r%r@t%r@a%r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@e%r@ %r@n%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@l%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@r%r@o%r@u%r@g%r@h%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@a%r@p%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@s%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@8%R@S%r@o%r@ %r@i%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@(%r@i%r@.%r@e%r@.%r@,%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@c%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@s%r@)%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@(%r@i%r@.%r@e%r@.%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@r%r@e%r@c%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@;%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@q%r@u%r@e%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@)%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %r@w%r@r%r@o%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@d%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@e%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@a%r@f%r@f%r@e%r@c%r@t%r@s%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@,%r@ %r@c%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@f%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@r%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@w%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@(%r@i%r@.%r@e%r@.%r@,%r@ %r@q%r@u%r@i%r@t%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@—%r@p%r@e%r@r%r@i%r@o%r@d%r@)%r@.%r@ %R@I%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@t%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@0%r@s%r@e%r@e%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@f%r@u%r@l%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@m%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@i%r@d%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@.%r@”%vn~
          %u@2%u@1Then Peter approached him and said, “Lord, how many times must I forgive a friend when he does me wrong? Up to seven%u@ (i.e., until it’s reached the point where enough is enough)?” %u@2%u@2Jesus said, %r@“%R@M%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@y%r@-%r@s%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%R@F%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@a%r@s%r@o%r@n%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@a%r@c%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@k%r@i%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@(%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@d%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@)%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@a%r@l%r@o%r@g%r@o%r@u%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@t%r@t%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@c%r@c%r@o%r@u%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@f%r@i%r@c%r@i%r@e%r@n%r@c%r@i%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@p%r@p%r@e%r@n%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@s%r@u%r@m%r@m%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@i%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@c%r@k%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@r%r@v%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@!%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@p%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@b%r@t%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@g%r@g%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@p%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@f%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@k%r@e%r@r%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@b%r@t%r@s%r@,%r@ %sb~
Matthew Chapter 19%hb~
          %u@1When Jesus came to the end of speaking this collection of messages, he picked up from Galilee and went to the Judean region, on the other side of the Jordan. %u@2A great crowd followed him, and he healed all that were there.%vn~
          %u@3In an attempt to test him, some Pharisees approached him saying, “Is there any reason for which a husband is allowed to divorce his wife?” %u@4In his response he answered, %r@“%R@H%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@e%r@s%r@t%r@a%r@b%r@l%r@i%r@s%r@h%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@t%r@i%r@q%r@u%r@i%r@t%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@H%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@d%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@m%r@a%r@n%r@,%r@ %r@h%r@u%r@s%r@b%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@,%r@’%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@O%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@c%r@c%r@o%r@u%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@m%r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@j%r@o%r@i%r@n%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@f%r@l%r@e%r@s%r@h%r@’%r@?%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@6%R@S%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@n%r@g%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@w%r@o%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@d%r@i%r@v%r@i%r@d%r@u%r@a%r@l%r@ %r@f%r@l%r@e%r@s%r@h%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@r%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@l%r@e%r@s%r@h%r@.%r@ %R@C%r@o%r@n%r@s%r@e%r@q%r@u%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@l%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@p%r@a%r@r%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ a divorce certificate in order to divorce her…’?” %u@8To this exchange, he replied, %r@“%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@O%r@l%r@d%r@ %R@T%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@r%r@m%r@i%r@t%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@v%r@o%r@r%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@c%r@a%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@r%r@d%r@h%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@n%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@;%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@p%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@t%r@o%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@t%r@i%r@q%r@u%r@i%r@t%r@y%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@9%R@I%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@,%r@ %r@e%r@x%r@c%r@e%r@p%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@x%r@u%r@a%r@l%r@ %r@i%r@m%r@m%r@o%r@r%r@a%r@l%r@i%r@t%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@v%r@o%r@r%r@c%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@m%r@a%r@r%r@r%r@i%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@m%r@i%r@t%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@d%r@u%r@l%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@.%r@”%r@ %u@1%u@0The disciples, responding to what they heard, said to him, “If this is the ask of the person who’s married, you’re better off not getting married.” %u@1%u@1He said, %r@“%R@N%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@b%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@k%r@e%r@e%r@p%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@m%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@m%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@g%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@,%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@s%r@e%r@e%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@o%r@r%r@n%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@l%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@c%r@a%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@o%r@p%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@d%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@s%r@e%r@l%r@v%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@h%r@a%r@l%r@f%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@d%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@.%r@ %R@H%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@b%r@i%r@l%r@i%r@t%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@k%r@e%r@e%r@p%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@ %r@k%r@e%r@e%r@p%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@.%r@”%vn~
          %u@1%u@3Then children were brought to him in order for him to lay hands on them and to pray for them, but the disciples barked at them and stopped them. %u@1%u@4Jesus said, %r@“%R@L%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@h%r@i%r@l%r@d%r@r%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@ %r@a%r@b%r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@d%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@p%r@r%r@i%r@s%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@s%r@u%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@s%r@e%r@.%r@” %u@1%u@5He laid his hands on them and then left from there.%vn~
          %u@1%u@6Just like that, a young man approached him and said,%vn~
      “Teacher, what good must I do in order to have that special fullness of life (eternal life)?”%vn~
          %u@1%u@7He said to him, %r@“%R@W%r@h%r@y%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@k%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@b%r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@d%r@e%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@?%r@ %R@T%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@d%r@e%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@o%r@d%r@.%r@ %R@B%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@p%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@i%r@c%r@i%r@p%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@e%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@n%r@a%r@l%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@k%r@e%r@e%r@p%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@m%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@m%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@s%r@.%r@”%vn~
          %u@1%u@8Engaged in the conversation, he said to him, “Which ones?”%vn~
      Jesus said, %r@“%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@s%r@:%r@ %r@‘%R@D%r@o%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@m%r@u%r@r%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@’%r@…%r@’%R@D%r@o%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@m%r@i%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@d%r@u%r@l%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@’%r@…%r@’%R@D%r@o%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@e%r@a%r@l%r@’%r@…%r@’%R@D%r@o%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@g%r@i%r@v%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@d%r@’%r@…%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@9%r@’%R@H%r@o%r@n%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@m%r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@’%r@…%r@’%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@s%r@h%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@n%r@e%r@i%r@g%r@h%r@b%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@s%r@e%r@l%r@f%r@’%r@.%r@”%vn~
          %u@2%u@0The young man, still engaged, said, “I’ve always been vigilant to do all these things. What am I missing still?”%vn~
          %u@2%u@1Jesus declared, %r@“%R@I%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@m%r@i%r@s%r@s%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@p%r@i%r@e%r@c%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@o%r@w%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@g%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@o%r@o%r@r%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@p%r@i%r@r%r@i%r@t%r@u%r@a%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@e%r@a%r@s%r@u%r@r%r@e%r@.%r@ %R@T%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@l%r@l%r@o%r@w%r@e%r@r%r@.%r@”%vn~
          %u@2%u@2After the young man heard this reply, he departed with a sulk, since he owned a lot of stuff. %u@2%u@3Jesus said to his disciples, %r@“%R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@d%r@d%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@r%r@d%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@r%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@p%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@i%r@c%r@i%r@p%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@d%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%R@L%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@y%r@—%r@i%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@e%r@a%r@s%r@i%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@c%r@r%r@o%r@u%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@w%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@c%r@r%r@a%r@w%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@r%r@o%r@u%r@g%r@h%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@s%r@m%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@g%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@o%r@r%r@t%r@a%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@g%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@v%r@o%r@l%r@v%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@r%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@(%r@t%r@o%r@ %r@e%r@n%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@d%r@o%r@m%r@)%r@.%r@” %u@2%u@5When the disciples heard this they were simply stunned and said, “So now, how can anyone avoid this?” %u@2%u@6Jesus looked right at them and said to them, %r@“%R@T%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@p%r@o%r@s%r@s%r@i%r@b%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@o%r@p%r@l%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@o%r@s%r@s%r@i%r@b%r@l%r@e%r@.%r@” %u@2%u@7Peter, in his response, answered, “See now, we, for our own part, have left everything and have become your followers. What’s going to happen to us?” %u@2%u@8Jesus said to them, %r@“%R@L%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@s%r@u%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@—%r@m%r@y%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@l%r@l%r@o%r@w%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@—%r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@n%r@e%r@x%r@t%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@M%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@a%r@k%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@r%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@g%r@l%r@o%r@r%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@g%r@i%r@n%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@i%r@g%r@n%r@,%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@s%r@e%r@l%r@v%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@s%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@o%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@i%r@d%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@w%r@e%r@l%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@r%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@o%r@w%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@r%r@u%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@n%r@t%r@i%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@n%r@a%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %R@I%r@s%r@r%r@a%r@e%r@l%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@9%R@A%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@y%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@f%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@r%r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@ %r@m%r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@ %r@c%r@h%r@i%r@l%r@d%r@r%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@l%r@i%r@h%r@o%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@a%r@c%r@c%r@o%r@u%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@c%r@e%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@h%r@u%r@g%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@m%r@o%r@u%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@t%r@u%r@r%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@g%r@i%r@t%r@i%r@m%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@l%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@c%r@l%r@a%r@i%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@a%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@s%r@p%r@e%r@c%r@i%r@a%r@l%r@ %r@f%r@u%r@l%r@l%r@n%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@ %r@(%r@e%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@n%r@a%r@l%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@)%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@0%R@A%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@r%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@l%r@a%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@l%r@a%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@r%r@s%r@t%r@.%r@”%vn~
%sb~
Matthew Chapter 20%hb~
          %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@”%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@d%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@a%r@l%r@o%r@g%r@o%r@u%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@k%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@g%r@r%r@e%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@g%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@$%r@1%r@0%r@0%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@a%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@o%r@u%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@n%r@i%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@o%r@r%r@n%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@w%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@u%r@y%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@n%r@g%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@w%r@n%r@ %r@s%r@q%r@u%r@a%r@r%r@e%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%R@H%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@i%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@o%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@ %r@o%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@v%r@i%r@n%r@e%r@y%r@a%r@r%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@p%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@a%r@s%r@o%r@n%r@a%r@b%r@l%r@e%r@.%r@’%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%R@S%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@.%r@ %R@A%r@g%r@a%r@i%r@n%r@,%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@v%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@u%r@r%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@t%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@g%r@a%r@i%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@r%r@e%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@6%R@I%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@l%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@f%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@n%r@o%r@o%r@n%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@o%r@u%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@x%r@,%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@r%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@c%r@r%r@o%r@s%r@s%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@n%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@a%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@W%r@h%r@y%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@o%r@u%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@d%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@w%r@n%r@ %r@s%r@q%r@u%r@a%r@r%r@e%r@?%r@’%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@7%R@T%r@a%r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@m%r@a%r@r%r@k%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@i%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@B%r@e%r@c%r@a%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@b%r@o%r@d%r@y%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@r%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@u%r@s%r@.%r@’%r@ %R@C%r@o%r@n%r@t%r@i%r@n%r@u%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@n%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@a%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@,%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@i%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@o%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@
