          %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@8%r@”%R@W%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@s%r@u%r@n%r@d%r@o%r@w%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@p%r@p%r@r%r@o%r@a%r@c%r@h%r@e%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@v%r@i%r@n%r@e%r@y%r@a%r@r%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@w%r@n%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@e%r@m%r@a%r@n%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@C%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@k%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@p%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@i%r@r%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@g%r@e%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@l%r@a%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@e%r@n%r@d%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@r%r@s%r@t%r@.%r@’%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@9%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@l%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@f%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@n%r@o%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@c%r@e%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@$%r@1%r@0%r@0%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@0%R@W%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@r%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@k%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@u%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@’%r@d%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@a%r@i%r@d%r@ %r@m%r@o%r@r%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@c%r@e%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@u%r@m%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@$%r@1%r@0%r@0%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%R@W%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@c%r@e%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@i%r@r%r@ %r@p%r@a%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@y%r@-%r@a%r@c%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@p%r@l%r@a%r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@e%r@m%r@a%r@n%r@,%r@%vn~
          %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@”%r@’%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@u%r@y%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@l%r@a%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@k%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@d%r@ %r@j%r@u%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@k%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@y%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@g%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@ %r@u%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@b%r@o%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@r%r@u%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@a%r@y%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@k%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@c%r@o%r@r%r@c%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@t%r@?%r@’%r@%vn~
          %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@”%R@H%r@e%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@p%r@l%r@i%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@H%r@e%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@d%r@d%r@y%r@,%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@c%r@h%r@e%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@.%r@ %R@D%r@i%r@d%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@a%r@g%r@r%r@e%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@$%r@1%r@0%r@0%r@?%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%R@T%r@a%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@y%r@.%r@ %R@I%r@f%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@p%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@l%r@a%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@g%r@u%r@y%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@—%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%R@D%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@g%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@t%r@?%r@ %R@O%r@r%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@b%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@t%r@t%r@i%r@t%r@u%r@d%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@c%r@a%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@g%r@e%r@n%r@e%r@r%r@o%r@s%r@i%r@t%r@y%r@’%r@%vn~
          %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@6%R@I%r@t%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@y%r@:%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@r%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@l%r@a%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@l%r@a%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@r%r@s%r@t%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~
          %u@1%u@7Jesus took the twelve disciples, and they went by themselves up to Jerusalem. Along the way, he told them, %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@8%r@”%R@L%r@o%r@o%r@k%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@’%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %R@J%r@e%r@r%r@u%r@s%r@a%r@l%r@e%r@m%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@M%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@a%r@k%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@t%r@o%r@ %r@c%r@u%r@s%r@t%r@o%r@d%r@y%r@ %r@b%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@h%r@i%r@e%r@f%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@i%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@s%r@i%r@g%r@n%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@a%r@c%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@e%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@9%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@ %r@o%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@R%r@o%r@m%r@a%r@n%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@r%r@i%r@d%r@i%r@c%r@u%r@l%r@e%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@f%r@l%r@o%r@g%r@g%r@e%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@c%r@r%r@u%r@c%r@i%r@f%r@i%r@e%r@d%r@.%r@ %R@A%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@r%r@d%r@ %r@d%r@a%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@s%r@u%r@r%r@r%r@e%r@c%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@.%r@”%vn~
          %u@2%u@0Then the mother of the sons of Zebedee came with her sons to bow down and ask something from him.%vn~
          %u@2%u@1He said, %r@“%R@W%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@?%r@”%vn~
      Taking advantage of the moment, she said, “Appoint these two sons of mine to be your right-hand men in your kingdom.”%vn~
          %u@2%u@2For his response Jesus replied, %r@“%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@k%r@n%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@.%r@ %R@W%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@b%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@r%r@o%r@u%r@g%r@h%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@r%r@o%r@u%r@g%r@h%r@?%r@”%vn~
      Fully aware, they said, “We are able.”%vn~
          %u@2%u@3He, matching their awareness, said, %r@“%R@T%r@o%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@r%r@o%r@u%r@g%r@h%r@,%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@r%r@o%r@u%r@g%r@h%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@p%r@p%r@o%r@i%r@n%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@r%r@i%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@-%r@h%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@c%r@i%r@d%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@s%r@e%r@r%r@v%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@e%r@p%r@a%r@r%r@e%r@d%r@.%r@”%vn~
          %u@2%u@4When the other ten heard of this, they became furious with the brothers. %u@2%u@5Jesus summoned them together and said, %r@“%R@A%r@s%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@k%r@n%r@o%r@w%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@r%r@u%r@l%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@n%r@a%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@s%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@w%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@u%r@b%r@j%r@u%r@g%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@u%r@n%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@i%r@r%r@ %r@e%r@s%r@p%r@e%r@c%r@i%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@y%r@-%r@p%r@o%r@w%r@e%r@r%r@f%r@u%r@l%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@t%r@a%r@l%r@ %r@a%r@u%r@t%r@h%r@o%r@r%r@i%r@t%r@y%r@ %r@o%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@6%R@I%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@s%r@h%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@s%r@p%r@e%r@c%r@i%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@y%r@-%r@p%r@o%r@w%r@e%r@r%r@f%r@u%r@l%r@ %r@a%r@m%r@o%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@,%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@r%r@v%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@,%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@7%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@s%r@h%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@r%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@m%r@o%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@s%r@l%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@—%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@8%r@j%r@u%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@M%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@d%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@r%r@v%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@r%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@g%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@d%r@e%r@m%r@p%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@p%r@a%r@y%r@m%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@y%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~
          %u@2%u@9A large crowd followed him as he left Jericho. %u@3%u@0Suddenly two blind men sitting alongside the road heard that Jesus was passing by, and shouted out,%vn~
      “Have mercy on us, sir, you godsend!”%vn~
          %u@3%u@1But the crowd yelled at them to keep quiet. But all the more louder they shouted out,%vn~
      “Have mercy on us, sir, you godsend!!”%vn~
          %u@3%u@2Jesus halted, called for them, and said, %r@“%R@W%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@?%r@”%vn~
          %u@3%u@3They said to him, “Sir, that we would be able to see.”%vn~
          %u@3%u@4Jesus felt deep compassion for them and touched their eyes, and right away they gained their sight and became his followers.%vn~
%sb~
Matthew Chapter 21%hb~
          %u@1When he drew near to Jerusalem and arrived at Bethphage, at the Mount of Olives, at that time Jesus sent out two disciples, %u@2telling them, %r@“%R@G%r@o%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@w%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@c%r@r%r@o%r@s%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@u%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@r%r@i%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@w%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@n%r@k%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@i%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@w%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@a%r@l%r@ %r@n%r@e%r@x%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@.%r@ %R@U%r@n%r@t%r@i%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%R@A%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@f%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@y%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@k%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@,%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@L%r@o%r@r%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@n%r@e%r@e%r@d%r@.%r@”%r@ %u@4This happened so that the Prophet Isaiah’s prophecy would be fulfilled, which says:%vn~
%si~
%u@5Say to the socialites%vp~
In the God-intended city of Jerusalem:%vp~
“Look!—your king is coming your way,%vp~
Self-restrained and soft-spoken and mounted on a donkey%vp~
And upon a pack animal’s foal”%u@%vp~
%si~
          %u@6The disciples went and did what Jesus told them to do. %u@7They lead away the donkey and the foal and placed their outer garments on them, and he sat on them. %u@8Most of the crowd spread their outer garments out on the road before him, while others chopped off tree branches and spread them out on the road. %u@9And the crowd of forerunners and the crowd of tail-runners kept shouting,%vn~
%si~
Rescue us by the godsend!%vp~
Praise be to him who comes at the Lord’s behest%vp~
Rescue us to the max!%vp~
%si~
          %u@1%u@0Having entered Jerusalem, the whole city was stirred up saying, “Who is this guy?” %u@1%u@1The crowd kept saying, “This here is the Prophet Jesus from Nazareth, Galilee.”%vn~
          %u@1%u@2Jesus entered the temple and threw out all the salesmen and the merchandisers in there. He overturned the tables of the money changers and those selling doves. %u@1%u@3He told them, %r@“%R@I%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@r%r@i%r@t%r@t%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@S%r@c%r@r%r@i%r@p%r@t%r@u%r@r%r@e%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@M%r@y%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@h%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@a%r@y%r@e%r@r%r@’%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@d%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@t%r@o%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@r%r@o%r@b%r@b%r@e%r@r%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@d%r@e%r@o%r@u%r@t%r@.%r@”%vn~
          %u@1%u@4In the temple the blind and lame came to him, and he healed them. %u@1%u@5The chief priests and the designated teachers, seeing the wonders that he did and seeing the children going around shouting “Rescue us by the godsend!”, became indignant. %u@1%u@6They said to him, “Do you hear what they’re saying?” Jesus, in step with the conversation, replied, %r@“%R@Y%r@e%r@s%r@.%r@ %R@H%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@v%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@I%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@q%r@u%r@e%r@u%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@e%r@x%r@a%r@l%r@t%r@a%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@o%r@u%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@t%r@h%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@f%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@s%r@’%r@.%r@” %u@1%u@7Excusing himself from them, he exited the city, went to Bethany, and spent the night there.%vn~
          %u@1%u@8While returning to the city at dawn, he became hungry. %u@1%u@9Seeing a fig tree alongside the road, he went over to it and found that it had nothing within it except for leaves only, and, addressing it, said to it, %r@“%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@n%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@g%r@a%r@i%r@n%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@u%r@i%r@t%r@—%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@.%r@”%r@ And right away the tree shriveled up. %u@2%u@0Seeing it, the disciples were amazed and were saying how the fig tree had shriveled up right away. %u@2%u@1Reacting to this, Jesus replied, %r@“%R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@u%r@t%r@h%r@:%r@ %r@i%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@u%r@b%r@t%r@,%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@u%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@e%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@d%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@m%r@o%r@u%r@n%r@t%r@a%r@i%r@n%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@B%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@a%r@k%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@r%r@o%r@w%r@n%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@a%r@’%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@p%r@a%r@s%r@s%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%R@A%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@k%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@a%r@y%r@e%r@r%r@,%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@l%r@i%r@e%r@v%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@c%r@e%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@.%r@”%vn~
          %u@2%u@3Having come to the temple, the chief priests and the councilmen approached him while he was teaching saying, “By what authority do you do these things? And who gave you this authority?” %u@2%u@4Jesus in his comeback answered, %r@“%R@C%r@o%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@r%r@n%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@g%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@u%r@t%r@h%r@o%r@r%r@i%r@t%r@y%r@:%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@s%r@w%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@q%r@u%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@i%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@s%r@w%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@m%r@i%r@n%r@e%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%R@W%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@d%r@ %R@J%r@o%r@h%r@n%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@a%r@p%r@t%r@i%r@s%r@m%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@,%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@k%r@i%r@n%r@d%r@?%r@” They were debating the matter amongst themselves saying, “If we say ‘from heaven’, then he’ll say, ‘Then why didn’t you believe in him?’. %u@2%u@6But if we say, ‘from mankind’, we’ll have good reason to be afraid of the crowd since they consider John to be a prophet.” %u@2%u@7They put forth their reply and answered Jesus, “We don’t know.” And so his answer to them was, %r@“%R@N%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@b%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@u%r@t%r@h%r@o%r@r%r@i%r@t%r@y%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@.%r@”%vn~
          %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@8%r@”%R@N%r@o%r@w%r@,%r@ %r@j%r@u%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@k%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@?%r@ %R@A%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@w%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@n%r@s%r@.%r@ %R@H%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@r%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@y%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@G%r@o%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@k%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@v%r@i%r@n%r@e%r@y%r@a%r@r%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@d%r@a%r@y%r@’%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@9%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@s%r@w%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@I%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@’%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@l%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@c%r@h%r@a%r@n%r@g%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@v%r@i%r@n%r@e%r@y%r@a%r@r%r@d%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@0%R@H%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@c%r@o%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@y%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@.%r@ %R@H%r@e%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@p%r@l%r@i%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@‘%R@Y%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@r%r@!%r@’%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@n%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%R@W%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@w%r@o%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@?%r@” They said, “The first.” Jesus said to them, %r@“%R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@—%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@ %r@g%r@e%r@t%r@t%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@v%r@o%r@l%r@v%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@ %r@(%r@g%r@e%r@t%r@t%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@t%r@o%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@d%r@o%r@m%r@)%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@a%r@x%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@l%r@l%r@e%r@c%r@t%r@o%r@r%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@           %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@”%R@L%r@i%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@a%r@l%r@o%r@g%r@y%r@.%r@ %R@A%r@n%r@ %r@e%r@s%r@t%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@ wicked men and lease the vineyard out to other farmers, ones who, when harvest time comes, will give him his produce.” %u@4%u@2Jesus said to them, %r@“%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@n%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@           %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@”%R@T%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@a%r@s%r@o%r@n%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@v%r@o%r@l%r@v%r@e%r@m%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@(%R@G%r@o%r@d%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@d%r@o%r@m%r@)%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@a%r@k%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@w%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@e%r@i%r@g%r@n%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@s%r@i%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@n%r@a%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@d%r@o%r@m%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@e%r@x%r@p%r@e%r@c%r@t%r@a%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@s%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%R@A%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@(%r@m%r@e%r@a%r@n%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@s%r@o%r@b%r@e%r@y%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@)%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@c%r@r%r@u%r@m%r@b%r@l%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@s%r@ %r@(%r@m%r@e%r@a%r@n%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@m%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@r%r@i%r@k%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@j%r@u%r@d%r@g%r@m%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@)%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@u%r@l%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@i%r@z%r@e%r@d%r@.%r@”%vn~
          %u@4%u@5When the chief priests and Pharisees heard these analogies, they realized that he was talking about them. %u@4%u@6Though they were trying to get their hands on him, they were afraid of the crowd, since they considered him to be a prophet.%vn~
%sb~
Matthew Chapter 22%hb~
          %u@1As he had been thinking things over for a while, Jesus again spoke to them by way of analogy. He said, %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@”%R@G%r@o%r@d%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@a%r@c%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@k%r@i%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@(%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@a%r@c%r@k%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@o%r@p%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@f%r@e%r@a%r@s%r@t%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@e%r@n%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@o%r@k%r@ %r@o%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@w%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@s%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@d%r@r%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@i%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@H%r@e%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@p%r@a%r@l%r@,%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@w%r@’%r@d%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@g%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@d%r@r%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@d%r@d%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@?%r@’%r@ %R@H%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@s%r@p%r@e%r@e%r@c%r@h%r@l%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@i%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@t%r@t%r@e%r@n%r@d%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@T%r@i%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@,%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@f%r@e%r@e%r@t%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@r%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@O%r@u%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@ %R@D%r@a%r@r%r@k%r@n%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@.%r@ %R@T%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@l%r@a%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@e%r@p%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@g%r@n%r@a%r@s%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@e%r@t%r@h%r@.%r@’%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@y%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@v%r@i%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@d%r@e%r@e%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@f%r@e%r@w%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@l%r@e%r@c%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@.%r@”%u@%vn~
          %u@1%u@5The Pharisees then met together to come up with a plan to find a way to trip him up in one of his statements. %u@1%u@6They sent him their disciples along with the Herodians saying,%vn~
      “Teacher, we know that you’re honest and that what you teach is the true way to God and that you could care less what anyone thinks about you; the fact is, you don’t key off other people’s attitudes. %u@1%u@7Tell us, now, what do you think? Do we have to pay Caesar the poll tax or not?”%vn~
          %u@1%u@8Knowing how evil they were, Jesus said, %r@“%R@H%r@y%r@p%r@o%r@c%r@r%r@i%r@t%r@e%r@s%r@—%r@w%r@h%r@y%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@y%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@i%r@p%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@?%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@9%R@S%r@h%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@u%r@s%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@p%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@a%r@x%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@.%r@”%vn~
      They brought him a denarius.%vn~
          %u@2%u@0On top of the situation, he said, %r@“%R@W%r@h%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@i%r@c%r@t%r@u%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@t%r@c%r@h%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@?%r@”%vn~
          %u@2%u@1They, keeping up with the conversation, said to him, “Caesar’s.”%vn~
      Then not missing a beat, he said, %r@“%R@S%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@,%r@ %r@g%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@ %R@C%r@a%r@e%r@s%r@a%r@r%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %R@C%r@a%r@e%r@s%r@a%r@r%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@.%r@”%vn~
          %u@2%u@2After they heard that, they were stunned and departed, leaving him there.%vn~
          %u@2%u@3Around that time, the Sadducees, who state that there is no life after death, asked him, %u@2%u@4“Teacher, the Old Testament Law says, ‘If someone who has no children were to die, his brother will marry his wife and raise offspring for his brother.’ %u@2%u@5Now there were seven brothers, and the first was married and died, not having any offspring, his wife was left to his brother. %u@2%u@6The same happened to the second brother, then to the third, and so on, up to the seventh. %u@2%u@7Last of all, the woman died. %u@2%u@8Therefore, in the next life, to which of the seven brothers will this woman be married to, since all of the brothers had married her?” %u@2%u@9Jesus answered them, %r@“%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@g%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@f%r@-%r@b%r@a%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@k%r@n%r@o%r@w%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@S%r@c%r@r%r@i%r@p%r@t%r@u%r@r%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@k%r@n%r@o%r@w%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@b%r@i%r@l%r@i%r@t%r@y%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@0%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@c%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@n%r@e%r@x%r@t%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@r%r@r%r@i%r@a%r@g%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@o%r@p%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@x%r@i%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@g%r@e%r@l%r@s%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%R@B%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@r%r@n%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@y%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@’%R@I%r@ %r@a%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %R@A%r@b%r@r%r@a%r@h%r@a%r@m%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %R@I%r@s%r@a%r@a%r@c%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %R@J%r@a%r@c%r@o%r@b%r@.%r@’%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@v%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@.%r@”%r@ %u@3%u@3The crowd heard this and was amazed at his explanation.%vn~
          %u@3%u@4Now after the Pharisees heard that he’d left the Sadducees speechless, they met together for the same reason. %u@3%u@5Testing him, one of their experts in Old Testament commandments asked him, %u@3%u@6”Teacher, which of the Old Testament commandments is the greatest?” %u@3%u@7He said, %r@“%r@’%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@s%r@h%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@L%r@o%r@r%r@d%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@e%r@n%r@t%r@i%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@e%r@n%r@t%r@i%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@’%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@8%R@T%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@r%r@e%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@e%r@m%r@o%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@m%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@m%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@9%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@c%r@o%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@m%r@i%r@l%r@a%r@r%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@s%r@h%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@n%r@e%r@i%r@g%r@h%r@b%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@s%r@e%r@l%r@f%r@.%r@’%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@0%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@n%r@t%r@i%r@r%r@e%r@ %R@O%r@l%r@d%r@ %R@T%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@s%r@u%r@m%r@m%r@a%r@r%r@i%r@z%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@b%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@w%r@o%r@.%r@”%vn~
          %u@4%u@1While the Pharisees were gathered, Jesus asked them, %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@”%R@W%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@k%r@ %r@a%r@b%r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@M%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@i%r@a%r@h%r@?%r@ %R@W%r@h%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@s%r@c%r@e%r@n%r@d%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@?%r@”%r@ Following along with the conversation, they said, “David’s.” %u@4%u@3Also following along, he said, %r@“%R@S%r@o%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@w%r@,%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %R@D%r@a%r@v%r@i%r@d%r@ %r@b%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@S%r@p%r@i%r@r%r@i%r@t%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@ %R@L%r@o%r@r%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@y%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@,%r@%vn~
%r@%si~
%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@”%R@A%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@-%r@p%r@o%r@w%r@e%r@r%r@f%r@u%r@l%r@ %R@L%r@o%r@r%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@i%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@r%r@d%r@,%r@%vp~
%R@B%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@r%r@i%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@-%r@h%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@%vp~
%R@U%r@n%r@t%r@i%r@l%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@c%r@i%r@d%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@u%r@b%r@d%r@u%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@e%r@n%r@e%r@m%r@i%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@u%r@b%r@j%r@u%r@g%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@%vp~
%r@%si~
%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%r@”%R@S%r@o%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@w%r@,%r@ %r@i%r@f%r@ %R@D%r@a%r@v%r@i%r@d%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@ %R@L%r@o%r@r%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@s%r@c%r@e%r@n%r@d%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@?%r@”%r@ %u@4%u@6No one could come up with a reply, nor from that day on did anyone dare question him about anything.%nn~
%sb~
Matthew Chapter 23%hb~
          %u@1Then Jesus had a talk with the crowd and his disciples, %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@“%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@S%r@c%r@r%r@i%r@b%r@e%r@s%r@—%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@s%r@i%r@g%r@n%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@a%r@c%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@—%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@P%r@h%r@a%r@r%r@i%r@s%r@e%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@p%r@p%r@o%r@i%r@n%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@f%r@o%r@r%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@o%r@b%r@s%r@e%r@r%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@p%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@t%r@o%r@ %r@a%r@c%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@n%r@d%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@v%r@y%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@a%r@d%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@g%r@e%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@—%r@t%r@o%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@v%r@y%r@—%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@o%r@p%r@l%r@e%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@s%r@h%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@r%r@k%r@e%r@t%r@p%r@l%r@a%r@c%r@e%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@o%r@p%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@ %r@‘%R@R%r@a%r@b%r@b%r@i%r@’%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@8%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@‘%R@R%r@a%r@b%r@b%r@i%r@’%r@;%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %R@R%r@a%r@b%r@b%r@i%r@—%r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@b%r@r%r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@9%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@y%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@p%r@l%r@a%r@n%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@‘%R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@’%r@;%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@0%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@e%r@d%r@           %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@7%r@”%R@J%r@e%r@r%r@u%r@s%r@a%r@l%r@e%r@m%r@,%r@ %R@J%r@e%r@r%r@u%r@s%r@a%r@l%r@e%r@m%r@,%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@o%r@p%r@h%r@e%r@t%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@r%r@,%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@t%r@e%r@n%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@g%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@c%r@i%r@t%r@i%r@z%r@e%r@n%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@j%r@u%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@g%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@c%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@k%r@s%r@ %r@u%r@n%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@8%R@T%r@a%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@o%r@k%r@—%R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@m%r@u%r@n%r@i%r@t%r@y%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@g%r@h%r@o%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@w%r@n%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@9%R@S%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@,%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@,%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@u%r@n%r@t%r@i%r@l%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@P%r@r%r@a%r@i%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@L%r@o%r@r%r@d%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@h%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@.%r@’%r@”%r@%vn~
%sb~
Matthew Chapter 24%hb~
          %u@1Having exited the temple, Jesus was going about his way, and his disciples went over to him to point out what a monumental achievement it was to build the temple. %u@2Jesus responded to them by saying, %r@“%R@S%r@e%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@?%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@u%r@t%r@h%r@—%r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@f%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@p%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@r%r@n%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@w%r@n%r@.%r@”%vn~
          %u@3When he took a seat on the Mount of Olives, his disciples came alone and said, “Tell us when these things will take place and what will be the sign of your appearance at the finale of the ages?” %u@4Jesus replied, %r@“%R@M%r@a%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@u%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@c%r@e%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@,%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%r@s%r@i%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@l%r@a%r@i%r@m%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@a%r@u%r@t%r@h%r@o%r@r%r@i%r@t%r@y%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@y%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@‘%R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@M%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@i%r@a%r@h%r@’%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@c%r@e%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@d%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@6%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@b%r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@r%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@ %r@n%r@e%r@w%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@r%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@m%r@m%r@i%r@n%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@.%r@ %R@D%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@a%r@r%r@m%r@e%r@d%r@;%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@ %r@m%r@u%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@p%r@p%r@e%r@n%r@.%r@ %R@B%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@y%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@7%R@N%r@a%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@n%r@a%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@a%r@l%r@i%r@t%r@i%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@r%r@i%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@g%r@a%r@i%r@n%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@n%r@a%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@n%r@a%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@a%r@l%r@i%r@t%r@i%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@d%r@e%r@e%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@d%r@o%r@m%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@g%r@a%r@i%r@n%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@p%r@l%r@a%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@p%r@l%r@a%r@c%r@e%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@8%R@A%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@s%r@e%r@—%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@r%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@p%r@p%r@r%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@t%r@r%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%R@M%r@a%r@n%r@y%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@i%r@l%r@ %r@i%r@m%r@p%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@o%r@n%r@a%r@t%r@o%r@r%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@o%r@p%r@h%r@e%r@t%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@c%r@e%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@y%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@t%r@r%r@a%r@y%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%R@B%r@e%r@c%r@a%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@m%r@o%r@u%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@l%r@a%r@w%r@l%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@n%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%R@H%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@a%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@e%r@n%r@d%r@u%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@u%r@n%r@t%r@i%r@l%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@o%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@—%r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@p%r@l%r@i%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@y%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@L%r@o%r@r%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@h%r@u%r@n%r@g%r@r%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@r%r@s%r@t%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@s%r@i%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@,%r@ %r@i%r@l%r@l%r@,%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@j%r@a%r@i%r@l%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@d%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@t%r@t%r@e%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@?%r@’%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@s%r@w%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@u%r@t%r@h%r@,%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@s%r@o%r@f%r@a%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@d%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@r%r@a%r@d%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@m%r@i%r@n%r@e%r@—%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@o%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@s%r@i%r@g%r@n%r@i%r@f%r@i%r@c%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@r%r@a%r@d%r@e%r@s%r@—%r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@d%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@.%r@’%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@6%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@e%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@n%r@a%r@l%r@ %r@p%r@u%r@n%r@i%r@s%r@h%r@m%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@r%r@i%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@e%r@o%r@u%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@s%r@p%r@e%r@c%r@i%r@a%r@l%r@ %r@f%r@u%r@l%r@l%r@n%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@ %r@(%r@e%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@n%r@a%r@l%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@)%r@.%r@”%vn~
%sb~
Matthew Chapter 26%hb~
          %u@1When Jesus finished up all these messages, he said to his disciples, %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@”%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@k%r@n%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@P%r@a%r@s%r@s%r@o%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@w%r@o%r@ %r@d%r@a%r@y%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@M%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@r%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@s%r@u%r@l%r@t%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@c%r@r%r@u%r@c%r@i%r@f%r@i%r@x%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@.%r@” %u@3At that time, the chief priests and the councilmen held a council in the courtyard of the High Priest Caiaphas. %u@4In that council, they decided that they must get ahold of Jesus and kill him. %u@5They kept saying, “Not in the midst of the festival, lest the people riot.”%vn~
          %u@6While Jesus was in Bethany in the house of Simon the Leper, %u@7a woman came to him with a jar of expensive myrrh and poured it all out on his head while he was sitting at the table. %u@8Seeing this, the disciples were enraged saying, “Why the waste? %u@9We could’ve sold this for a lot of money and given the proceeds to the poor.” %u@1%u@0Aware of this, Jesus told them, %r@“%R@W%r@h%r@y%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@o%r@b%r@l%r@e%r@m%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@l%r@a%r@d%r@y%r@?%r@ %R@T%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@c%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@s%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@h%r@a%r@l%r@f%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@w%r@a%r@y%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@o%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@m%r@o%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@o%r@u%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@c%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@s%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@l%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@r%r@r%r@h%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@b%r@o%r@d%r@y%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@e%r@m%r@b%r@a%r@l%r@m%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@u%r@t%r@h%r@—%r@w%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@n%r@e%r@w%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@o%r@c%r@l%r@a%r@i%r@m%r@e%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@s%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@s%r@o%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@a%r@l%r@k%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@b%r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@p%r@e%r@c%r@i%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@m%r@e%r@m%r@b%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@d%r@.%r@”%vn~
          %u@1%u@4Then one of the Twelve named Judas Iscariot went to the high priest %u@1%u@5and said, “How much would you pay for me to betray him, getting him handed over into your custody?” They agreed to a price of $10,000. %u@1%u@6From then on he began to look for an opportunity to facilitate his arrest by betrayal.%vn~
          %u@1%u@7On the first day of the Feast of Unleavened Bread, the disciples said to Jesus, “How would you like us to make Passover preparations for you?” %u@1%u@8He said, %r@“%R@G%r@o%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@i%r@t%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@-%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@-%r@s%r@o%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@k%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@T%r@e%r@a%r@c%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@y%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@“%R@I%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@y%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@s%r@c%r@i%r@p%r@l%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@o%r@b%r@s%r@e%r@r%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@P%r@a%r@s%r@s%r@o%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@p%r@l%r@a%r@c%r@e%r@”%r@.%r@’%r@”%r@ %u@1%u@9The disciples did what Jesus told them to do and made preparations for the Passover. %u@2%u@0When evening came, he was at the table with the Twelve. %u@2%u@1While they were eating, he said, %r@“%R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@u%r@t%r@h%r@—%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@t%r@r%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@.%r@” %u@2%u@2Being deeply grieved, they started telling him over and over, each one of them, “No way it’s me, right Lord?” %u@2%u@3He came up with a reply and said, “%R@W%r@h%r@o%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@r%r@a%r@i%r@s%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@g%r@l%r@a%r@s%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@f%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@a%r@s%r@t%r@—%r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@u%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@t%r@r%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%R@W%r@h%r@i%r@l%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@d%r@e%r@e%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@M%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@l%r@l%r@o%r@w%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@a%r@j%r@e%r@c%r@t%r@o%r@r%r@y%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@f%r@i%r@n%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %R@S%r@c%r@r%r@i%r@p%r@t%r@u%r@r%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@o%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@f%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@t%r@r%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@:%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@g%r@u%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@t%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@f%r@ %r@i%r@f%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@’%r@d%r@ %r@n%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@b%r@o%r@r%r@n%r@.%r@”%r@ %u@2%u@5Judas, his betrayer, responded, “No way it’s me, right Teacher?” Jesus, engaged by the remark, said, %r@“%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@i%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@,%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@.%r@”%vn~
          %u@2%u@6While they were eating, Jesus took a loaf of bread, offered up thanksgiving, and broke it and gave it to his disciples and said, %r@“%R@T%r@a%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@e%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@:%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@b%r@o%r@d%r@y%r@.%r@”%r@ %u@2%u@7He took a cup, offered up thanksgiving, and gave it to them saying, %r@“%R@A%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@—%r@d%r@r%r@i%r@n%r@k%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@:%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@8%r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@b%r@l%r@o%r@o%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@l%r@o%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@,%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@h%r@a%r@l%r@f%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@y%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@p%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@g%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@n%r@s%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@9%R@I%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@ %r@u%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@r%r@t%r@a%r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@r%r@m%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@f%r@i%r@n%r@i%r@t%r@e%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@d%r@r%r@i%r@n%r@k%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@o%r@d%r@u%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@v%r@i%r@n%r@e%r@y%r@a%r@r%r@d%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@u%r@n%r@t%r@i%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@d%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@d%r@r%r@i%r@n%r@k%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@e%r@w%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@d%r@o%r@m%r@.%r@” %u@3%u@0After they sang some hymns, they departed for the Mount of Olives.%vn~
          %u@3%u@1Then Jesus said to them, %r@“%R@A%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@n%r@i%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@,%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@o%r@p%r@h%r@e%r@s%r@i%r@e%r@d%r@,%r@%vn~
%r@%si~
%r@“%R@I%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@r%r@i%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@h%r@e%r@p%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@d%r@,%r@%vp~
%R@A%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@l%r@o%r@c%r@k%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@s%r@c%r@a%r@t%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@%vp~
%r@%si~
%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@”%R@A%r@f%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@s%r@u%r@r%r@r%r@e%r@c%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@,%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@h%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %R@G%r@a%r@l%r@i%r@l%r@e%r@e%r@.%r@”%r@ %u@3%u@3Peter responded to the statement and replied, “Even if everyone else falls out with you, I never will.” %u@3%u@4Jesus said to him, %r@“%R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@v%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@ %r@n%r@i%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@n%r@y%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@f%r@o%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@r%r@o%r@o%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@c%r@r%r@o%r@w%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@r%r@e%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@i%r@m%r@e%r@s%r@.%r@” %u@3%u@5Peter, in line with what he’d been told, said to him, “Even if I have to die together with you, I’ll definitely not deny you.” All the other disciples said the same thing.%nn~
          %u@3%u@6Then Jesus went with them to a place called Gethsemane and prompts the disciples, %r@“%R@S%r@i%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@w%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@u%r@n%r@t%r@i%r@l%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@a%r@y%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@o%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@.%r@”%r@ %u@3%u@7Taking along Peter and the two sons of Zebedee, he began to be grieved and to be in anguish. %u@3%u@8Engaging them in conversation, he said to them, %r@“%R@M%r@y%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@r%r@o%r@u%r@g%r@h%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@g%r@r%r@i%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@o%r@i%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@:%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@e%r@r%r@t%r@.%r@”%r@ %u@3%u@9He ventured out a bit and fell on his face in prayer saying, %r@“%R@M%r@y%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@,%r@ %r@i%r@f%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@p%r@o%r@s%r@s%r@i%r@b%r@l%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@d%r@e%r@a%r@l%r@ %r@p%r@a%r@s%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@y%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@ %r@a%r@w%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@;%r@ %r@n%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@l%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@
