%r@h%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@b%r@u%r@n%r@d%r@a%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@m%r@o%r@u%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@s%r@p%r@e%r@a%r@k%r@s%r@.%r@%vn~
          %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@6%r@”%R@N%r@o%r@w%r@,%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@y%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@‘%R@B%r@o%r@s%r@s%r@,%r@ %R@B%r@o%r@s%r@s%r@!%r@’%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@y%r@?%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@7%R@E%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@s%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@d%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@,%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@s%r@h%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@p%r@a%r@r%r@a%r@b%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@:%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@8%R@H%r@e%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@p%r@a%r@r%r@a%r@b%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@i%r@l%r@d%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@d%r@u%r@g%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@w%r@n%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@e%r@p%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@o%r@t%r@t%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@p%r@l%r@a%r@c%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@u%r@n%r@d%r@a%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@d%r@r%r@o%r@c%r@k%r@.%r@ %R@A%r@ %r@f%r@l%r@a%r@s%r@h%r@-%r@f%r@l%r@o%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@o%r@r%r@m%r@ %r@a%r@p%r@p%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@e%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@n%r@d%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@r%r@a%r@s%r@h%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@o%r@r%r@m%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@s%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@p%r@o%r@w%r@e%r@r%r@f%r@u%r@l%r@ %r@e%r@n%r@o%r@u%r@g%r@h%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@r%r@a%r@t%r@t%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@c%r@c%r@o%r@u%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@-%r@b%r@u%r@i%r@l%r@t%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@9%R@B%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@e%r@s%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@,%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@p%r@a%r@r%r@a%r@b%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@i%r@l%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@i%r@l%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@u%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@u%r@n%r@d%r@a%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@r%r@e%r@a%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@r%r@a%r@s%r@h%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@m%r@m%r@e%r@d%r@i%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@l%r@l%r@a%r@p%r@s%r@e%r@d%r@.%r@ %R@W%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@o%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@x%r@t%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@l%r@l%r@a%r@p%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@e%r@n%r@o%r@r%r@m%r@o%r@u%r@s%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~
%sb~
Luke Chapter 7%hb~
          %u@1Since he finished going through all of his material with those listening—a bunch of ordinary folk—he entered Capernaum. %u@2Now there was this centurion’s servant, whom the centurion held in high esteem, who was sick and about to pass away. %u@3Having heard about Jesus, he sent distinguished, respected Jewish citizens to him, asking him if he would come and resuscitate his servant. %u@4Approaching Jesus, they asked him—begged him—to hurry up, saying that this particular individual is worth him going out of his way to help, %u@5since he loves and values our people, and that he single-handedly built us a synagogue. %u@6So Jesus proceeded to go with them.%vn~
      They had already made it to where they were not too far from his house, when the centurion sent some of his close friends telling him, “Sir, don’t put yourself out; you see, it’s not appropriate for you to set foot in my house for a visit, %u@7seeing that I’m not considered worthy of you associating with me. Instead, just say the word and have my servant receive healing. %u@8You see, I too am a man who’s under chain-of-command-structured authority, having soldiers under me. I tell this one, ‘Have him go forth,’ and he goes, and tell someone else, ‘Come here’ and he comes, and tell my servant, ‘Do this thing,’ and he does it.” %u@9Jesus heard these things and was amazed at him and turned to the crowd following him and said, %r@“%R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@,%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@r%r@u%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@c%r@r%r@o%r@s%r@s%r@ %r@s%r@u%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@y%r@w%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@l%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %R@I%r@s%r@r%r@a%r@e%r@l%r@.%r@” %u@1%u@0When they got back home, those who were dispatched found the servant in good health.%vn~
          %u@1%u@1The next thing that happened was that he went to a city called Nain, accompanied by his disciples and by a large crowd. %u@1%u@2As he neared the city gate, he ran across a dead man being carried out, his mother’s only son (and she herself was a widow); a sizable crowd from the city was accompanying her. %u@1%u@3Upon seeing her, the Lord felt compassion deep in his heart for her and said, %r@“%R@D%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@c%r@r%r@y%r@.%r@”%r@ %u@1%u@4He went over and touched the open coffin; the pallbearers came to a halt and stood still. He said, %r@“%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@,%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@s%r@p%r@e%r@a%r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@—%r@g%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@!%r@” %u@1%u@5The dead person sat up and began talking, and they handed him over to his mother. %u@1%u@6A deep reverence came upon everyone, and they glorified God saying that a great prophet had been brought to prominence among them, and that God has paid a visit to His people. %u@1%u@7The news of this affair propagated throughout the entire region of Judea and all the surrounding area.%vn~
          %u@1%u@8His disciples told John about all of these things, and John summoned two of his disciples %u@1%u@9and sent them to the Lord saying, “Are you the One-Who-Is-To-Come, or should we wait for someone else?” %u@2%u@0These men met with him and said, “John the Baptist sent us to you to say, ‘Are you the One-Who-Is-To-Come, or should we wait for someone else?’” %u@2%u@1During the last couple of hours just then, he had treated many people of diseases, of whatever bad thing happened to be beating the tar out of them, and of evil spirits, and he graciously granted many who were blind the gift of sight. %u@2%u@2He replied to them, %r@“%R@G%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@ %R@J%r@o%r@h%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@w%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@d%r@:%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@g%r@a%r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@i%r@r%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@l%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@l%r@k%r@,%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@p%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@u%r@r%r@g%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@i%r@r%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@p%r@r%r@o%r@s%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@a%r@f%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@s%r@u%r@r%r@r%r@e%r@c%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@i%r@t%r@u%r@t%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@n%r@e%r@w%r@s%r@—%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@b%r@l%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@f%r@e%r@n%r@d%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@.%r@”%vn~
          %u@2%u@4So John’s messengers left, and he proceeded to speak to the crowd about John, %r@“%R@W%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@d%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@u%r@n%r@t%r@r%r@y%r@s%r@i%r@d%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@a%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@o%r@k%r@ %r@a%r@t%r@?%r@ %R@A%r@ %r@t%r@w%r@i%r@g%r@ %r@f%r@l%r@u%r@t%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@r%r@e%r@e%r@z%r@e%r@?%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%R@I%r@n%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@d%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@n%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@?%r@ %R@A%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@d%r@r%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@l%r@i%r@c%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@p%r@p%r@a%r@r%r@e%r@l%r@?%r@ %R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@s%r@p%r@l%r@e%r@n%r@d%r@i%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@t%r@t%r@i%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@v%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@l%r@u%r@x%r@u%r@r%r@y%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@p%r@a%r@l%r@a%r@c%r@e%r@s%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@6%R@R%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@,%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@d%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@?%r@ %R@A%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@o%r@p%r@h%r@e%r@t%r@?%r@—%R@Y%r@e%r@s%r@,%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@m%r@o%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@j%r@u%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@r%r@u%r@n%r@-%r@o%r@f%r@-%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@-%r@m%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@o%r@p%r@h%r@e%r@t%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@7%R@T%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@o%r@w%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@r%r@i%r@t%r@t%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@b%r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %R@S%r@c%r@r%r@i%r@p%r@t%r@u%r@r%r@e%r@,%r@%vn~
%r@%si~
%r@“%R@S%r@e%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@,%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@e%r@n%r@g%r@e%r@r%r@%vp~
%R@T%r@o%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@t%r@t%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@x%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@,%r@%vp~
%R@W%r@h%r@o%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@e%r@p%r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@r%r@o%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@h%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@%vp~
%r@%si~
%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@8%r@”%R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@,%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@b%r@o%r@d%r@y%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@b%r@o%r@r%r@n%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@p%r@l%r@a%r@n%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@g%r@r%r@e%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@n%r@ %R@J%r@o%r@h%r@n%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@a%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@g%r@n%r@i%r@f%r@i%r@c%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@v%r@o%r@l%r@v%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@(%r@i%r@n%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@d%r@o%r@m%r@)%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@g%r@r%r@e%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@.%r@”%r@ %u@2%u@9Everyone in the crowd who was listening—ordinary folk including tax collectors—had affirmed God, making Him the right choice, having been baptized in John’s baptism. %u@3%u@0But the Pharisees and the Old Testament experts disavowed God’s will, plan, and purpose for their own selves, not being baptized by him.%nn~
          %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@“%R@F%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@t%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@,%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@a%r@l%r@o%r@g%r@y%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@n%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@d%r@r%r@a%r@w%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@p%r@a%r@r%r@i%r@s%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@d%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@e%r@s%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@-%r@d%r@a%r@y%r@ %R@Z%r@e%r@i%r@t%r@g%r@e%r@i%r@s%r@t%r@?%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@’%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@p%r@a%r@r%r@a%r@b%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@c%r@h%r@i%r@l%r@d%r@r%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@t%r@t%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@o%r@u%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@r%r@k%r@e%r@t%r@p%r@l%r@a%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@o%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@c%r@h%r@i%r@l%r@d%r@r%r@e%r@n%r@,%r@%vn~
%r@%sp~
      %r@“%R@W%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@l%r@a%r@y%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@l%r@u%r@t%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@d%r@a%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@;%r@%vn~
      %R@W%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@r%r@g%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@e%r@p%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@i%r@l%r@%vn~
%r@%sp~
%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@”%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@c%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@,%r@ %R@J%r@o%r@h%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@B%r@a%r@p%r@t%r@i%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@c%r@e%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@e%r@a%r@t%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@b%r@r%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@ %r@d%r@r%r@i%r@n%r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@n%r@e%r@—%r@l%r@i%r@v%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@a%r@u%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@i%r@t%r@y%r@—%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@H%r@e%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@p%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@y%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@m%r@o%r@n%r@.%r@’%r@”%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@M%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@c%r@e%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@a%r@t%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@d%r@r%r@i%r@n%r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@—%r@l%r@i%r@v%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@—%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@G%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@h%r@o%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@g%r@u%r@y%r@—%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@i%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@o%r@u%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@a%r@x%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@l%r@l%r@e%r@c%r@t%r@o%r@r%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@n%r@d%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@n%r@n%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@.%r@’%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%R@W%r@i%r@s%r@d%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@c%r@l%r@a%r@r%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@r%r@r%r@e%r@c%r@t%r@ %r@b%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@n%r@d%r@-%r@r%r@e%r@s%r@u%r@l%r@t%r@.%r@”%r@%nn~
          %u@3%u@6One of the Pharisees asked if he would dine with him, and he entered the Pharisee’s house and was seated. %u@3%u@7By chance, there was a woman there in that city—a sinner—and she found out that he was dining at the Pharisee’s house, and she took a jar of myrrh %u@3%u@8and stood next to him, across from his feet, sobbing with tears all over. She proceeded to rain tears down on his feet, wipe them down with her hair and fervently kiss them, and to pour myrrh all over them. %u@3%u@9Seeing this, the Pharisee who invited him over said to himself,%vn~
      “If this guy were a prophet, he’d be mindful of who the woman is who’s touching him and of what sort of woman she is, since she’s a sinner.”%vn~
          %u@4%u@0Jesus’s response to this was, %r@“%R@S%r@i%r@m%r@o%r@n%r@,%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@d%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@.%r@”%vn~
      “Speak up, teacher”.%vn~
          %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@”%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@w%r@o%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@b%r@t%r@o%r@r%r@s%r@.%r@ %R@T%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@r%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@w%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@$%r@5%r@0%r@,%r@0%r@0%r@0%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@c%r@o%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@w%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@$%r@5%r@,%r@0%r@0%r@0%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@o%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@n%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%R@N%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@u%r@n%r@d%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@p%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@o%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@k%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@o%r@k%r@.%r@ %R@S%r@o%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@w%r@,%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@k%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@o%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@n%r@d%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@?%r@”%r@%vn~
          %u@4%u@3Simon answered, “I suppose the one who had the greater amount cancelled will be.”%vn~
      He said, %r@“%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@u%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@r%r@i%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~
          %u@4%u@4He turned to the woman and said to Simon, %r@“%R@S%r@e%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@m%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@?%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@e%r@n%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@d%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@p%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@f%r@e%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@s%r@h%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@;%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@s%r@h%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@w%r@,%r@ %r@s%r@h%r@o%r@w%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@f%r@e%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@p%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@i%r@r%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@d%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@g%r@r%r@e%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@s%r@s%r@;%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@s%r@h%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@w%r@,%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@s%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@o%r@p%r@p%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@s%r@s%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@f%r@e%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@s%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@n%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@6%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@d%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@r%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@;%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@s%r@h%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@w%r@,%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@f%r@e%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@s%r@p%r@e%r@c%r@i%r@a%r@l%r@ %r@o%r@i%r@l%r@—%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@7%R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@b%r@l%r@u%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@—%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@n%r@s%r@—%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@—%r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@g%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@c%r@a%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@v%r@o%r@l%r@u%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@v%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@v%r@a%r@l%r@u%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@p%r@p%r@r%r@e%r@c%r@i%r@a%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@r%r@.%r@ %R@H%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@g%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@t%r@t%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@v%r@e%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@v%r@a%r@l%r@u%r@e%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@p%r@p%r@r%r@e%r@c%r@i%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@t%r@t%r@l%r@e%r@.%r@”%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@8%R@H%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@i%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@r%r@,%r@ %r@“%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@n%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@g%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@.%r@” %u@4%u@9The dinner guests started to talk among themselves, “Who is this guy?—He even forgives sins.” %u@5%u@0He said to the woman, %r@“%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@s%r@c%r@u%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@;%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@a%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@(%r@i%r@.%r@e%r@.%r@,%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@e%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@n%r@f%r@l%r@i%r@c%r@t%r@,%r@ %r@d%r@u%r@r%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@f%r@f%r@l%r@i%r@c%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@)%r@.%r@”%vn~
%sb~
Luke Chapter 8%hb~
          %u@1The next thing that happened was that he was travelling non-stop from city to city and town to town preaching the good news of God’s involvement with mankind (God’s kingdom), accompanied by the Twelve %u@2and by certain women who had been treated from being afflicted by filthy, disgusting spirits and from ailments, Mary (called Magdalene), from whom seven demons had come out, %u@3and Joanna the wife of Herod’s butler Chuza, Susanna, and many others, the very women who were there for them time and time again attending to their needs, doing so from out of their personal wealth and belongings.%vn~
          %u@4As a large crowd was gathering—including those travelling from each city to see him—he spoke by means of analogy, %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%r@”%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@w%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@d%r@.%r@ %R@I%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@w%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@,%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@p%r@p%r@e%r@n%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@n%r@e%r@x%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@e%r@p%r@p%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@i%r@r%r@d%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@t%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@6%R@O%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@l%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@r%r@o%r@c%r@k%r@y%r@ %r@g%r@r%r@o%r@u%r@n%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@s%r@h%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@d%r@r%r@i%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@c%r@a%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@d%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@o%r@i%r@s%r@t%r@u%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@n%r@e%r@e%r@d%r@e%r@d%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@7%R@O%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@f%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@r%r@n%r@ %r@p%r@a%r@t%r@c%r@h%r@e%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@r%r@n%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@s%r@h%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@g%r@r%r@e%r@w%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@o%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@i%r@d%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@c%r@h%r@o%r@k%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@8%R@O%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@f%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@s%r@i%r@g%r@n%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@ %r@‘%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@g%r@r%r@o%r@u%r@n%r@d%r@,%r@’%r@ %r@g%r@r%r@e%r@w%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@o%r@d%r@u%r@c%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@1%r@0%r@0%r@-%r@t%r@o%r@-%r@1%r@ %r@y%r@i%r@e%r@l%r@d%r@.%r@”%r@ In the course of delivering this message, he kept on saying, %r@“%R@A%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@s%r@u%r@f%r@f%r@i%r@c%r@i%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@.%r@”%vn~
          %u@9Now his disciples asked him what the analogy was supposed to mean. %u@1%u@0He said, %r@“%R@I%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@g%r@r%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@a%r@c%r@q%r@u%r@i%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@ %r@u%r@n%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@t%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@i%r@o%r@u%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@o%r@f%r@o%r@u%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@v%r@o%r@l%r@v%r@e%r@m%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@k%r@i%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@(%R@G%r@o%r@d%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@d%r@o%r@m%r@)%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@l%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@f%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@j%r@u%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@n%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@o%r@r%r@i%r@e%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@,%r@%vn~
%r@%si~
%r@“%R@W%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@’%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@o%r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@%vp~
%R@W%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@’%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@n%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@u%r@n%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@t%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@%vp~
%r@%si~
          %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@”%R@S%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@a%r@l%r@o%r@g%r@y%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@a%r@n%r@s%r@:%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@d%r@s%r@ %r@n%r@e%r@x%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@v%r@i%r@l%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@m%r@o%r@v%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@d%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@i%r@r%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@l%r@i%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@e%r@s%r@c%r@a%r@p%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@i%r@r%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@e%r@d%r@i%r@c%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@d%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@r%r@o%r@c%r@k%r@y%r@ %r@g%r@r%r@o%r@u%r@n%r@d%r@—%r@w%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@o%r@p%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@c%r@e%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@j%r@o%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@o%r@p%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@ %r@r%r@o%r@o%r@t%r@-%r@s%r@y%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@m%r@:%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@l%r@i%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@v%r@a%r@l%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@i%r@m%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@d%r@u%r@r%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@r%r@i%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@p%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@a%r@w%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%R@N%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@r%r@n%r@ %r@p%r@a%r@t%r@c%r@h%r@e%r@s%r@—%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@b%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@x%r@i%r@e%r@t%r@i%r@e%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@b%r@u%r@n%r@d%r@a%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@a%r@l%r@t%r@h%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@l%r@e%r@a%r@s%r@u%r@r%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@’%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@h%r@o%r@k%r@e%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@i%r@r%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@u%r@i%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@b%r@r%r@o%r@u%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@t%r@u%r@r%r@i%r@t%r@y%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%R@N%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@i%r@l%r@—%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@-%r@a%r@r%r@o%r@u%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@o%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@l%r@d%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@t%r@o%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@b%r@y%r@           %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@6%r@”%R@N%r@o%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@l%r@a%r@m%r@p%r@ %r@o%r@b%r@s%r@c%r@u%r@r%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@b%r@y%r@ %r@p%r@u%r@t%r@t%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@b%r@o%r@x%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@ %r@u%r@n%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@n%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@u%r@c%r@h%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@p%r@u%r@t%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@l%r@a%r@m%r@p%r@s%r@t%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@o%r@v%r@i%r@d%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@n%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@7%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@c%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@d%r@d%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@v%r@i%r@s%r@i%r@b%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@,%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@c%r@r%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@k%r@n%r@o%r@w%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@v%r@i%r@s%r@i%r@b%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@8%R@S%r@o%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@w%r@,%r@ %r@p%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@a%r@t%r@t%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@n%r@.%r@ %R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@k%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@k%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@k%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@a%r@k%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@w%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~
          %u@1%u@9Now his mother and brothers stopped by but weren’t able to pay him a visit on account of the crowd. %u@2%u@0They sent him a message, “Your mother and your brothers are standing outside wanting to see you.” %u@2%u@1But he replied to them, %r@“%R@M%r@y%r@ %r@m%r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@b%r@r%r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@.%r@”%vn~
          %u@2%u@2Something happened one day. He and his disciples boarded a boat and he told them, %r@“%R@L%r@e%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@c%r@r%r@o%r@s%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@d%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@l%r@a%r@k%r@e%r@,%r@”%r@ and they set sail. %u@2%u@3While sailing, he fell asleep. A wind storm touched down on the lake, and the boat began to take on water and was in danger. %u@2%u@4They went over to him and woke him up, “Boss, boss, we’re going under!” He got up, spoke sternly to the wind and the high waves, and they stopped and it became calm. %u@2%u@5He said to them, %r@“%R@W%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@?%r@”%r@ They became awestruck, saying to each other, “Just who is this guy, that he commands the winds and the water, and they obey him?”%vn~
          %u@2%u@6They landed in the district of the Gerasenes, which is across the lake from Galilee. %u@2%u@7After disembarking onto dry land, a man accosted him, someone from the city who had a demon which was harassing him. For a good amount of time, he hadn’t been wearing clothes, and he wasn’t living in a house but instead was living in the tombs. %u@2%u@8Seeing Jesus, he screamed, prostrated himself in front of him, and said in a loud voice, “I have no beef with you, Jesus son of the Most High God. I’m begging you—don’t torment me.”%vn~
          %u@2%u@9You see, he had commanded the dirty, disgusting spirit to come out of the man. As things were, for a long time it had held a tight grip on him, and he was kept tied up in chains, hands and feet both, continuously being restrained. Constantly breaking the chains, he kept on being driven by the demon out to the middle of nowhere. %u@3%u@0Jesus asked him, %r@“%R@W%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@n%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@?%r@”%r@ He said, %r@“%r@’%R@R%r@e%r@g%r@i%r@m%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@’%r@,%r@”%r@ since many demons had entered him. %u@3%u@1They begged that he wouldn’t order them to be sent away into the Bottomless Pit.%vn~
          %u@3%u@2Now there was a sizable herd of pigs there feeding on the hill, and they begged him to permit them to enter into those animals. He permitted them. %u@3%u@3The demons left the man and entered the pigs, and the herd rushed down the cliff into the lake and drowned.%vn~
          %u@3%u@4Seeing what had happened, the pig herders began to flee, and they spread the report in the city and in the grain fields. %u@3%u@5People came out to look at and see for themselves what had taken place and went to Jesus and found the man from whom the demons left sitting, clothed, in a sound state of mind, and submitting himself to Jesus, sitting at his feet, and they became terrified. %u@3%u@6Those watching how the demon-possessed man was set straight and restored to sanity filled them in on what happened. %u@3%u@7The entire multitude from the area surrounding the Gerasenes asked him to go away, because a tremendous fear had come over them. In response, he got in the boat and returned across the lake. %u@3%u@8The man from whom the demons had left kept on begging him if he could be with him from then on. But he sent him away saying, %u@3%u@9“Go back home and tell all about what God did for you.” He went throughout the entire city proclaiming and preaching what Jesus did for him.%vn~
          %u@4%u@0While Jesus was returning, the crowd kept on welcoming him enthusiastically, beckoning him. The fact is, all of them were waiting for him to return. %u@4%u@1Out of nowhere, a man named Jairus, and this man was one of the leading me of the synagogue, fell at Jesus’s feet asking him—begging him—to come to his house, %u@4%u@2since his only daughter, who was around twelve years old, was near death.%vn~
      While he was heading there, the crowd kept on throttling him. %u@4%u@3A woman with a hemorrhage, who had it for the last twelve years, and who spent her entire life-savings on doctors, no one being able to cure her, %u@4%u@4got right up behind him and touched the tassel on his outer cloak, and immediately her hemorrhage ceased. %u@4%u@5Jesus said, %r@“%R@W%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@u%r@c%r@h%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@?%r@”%r@ While everyone was denying having done it, Peter said, “Boss, the crowd is crowding in on you non-stop and squeezing you.” %u@4%u@6Jesus said, %r@“%R@S%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@u%r@c%r@h%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@;%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@,%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@a%r@w%r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@c%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@m%r@i%r@r%r@a%r@c%r@u%r@l%r@o%r@u%r@s%r@ %r@p%r@o%r@w%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@.%r@”%r@ %u@4%u@7Seeing that she hadn’t escaped notice, the woman, trembling, came and prostrated herself before him and announced for all to hear the reason she touched him and how she was healed instantly. %u@4%u@8He told her, %r@“%R@M%r@a%r@’%r@a%r@m%r@,%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@s%r@c%r@u%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@.%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@a%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@(%r@i%r@.%r@e%r@.%r@,%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@e%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@n%r@f%r@l%r@i%r@c%r@t%r@,%r@ %r@d%r@u%r@r%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@f%r@f%r@l%r@i%r@c%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@)%r@.%r@”%vn~
          %u@4%u@9While he was still speaking, a particular person from the synagogue leadership came saying to Jairus, “Your daughter has died; you don’t need to bother the teacher anymore.” %u@5%u@0Jesus heard this and responded to him, %r@“%R@D%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@f%r@r%r@a%r@i%r@d%r@;%r@ %r@j%r@u%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@l%r@i%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@h%r@e%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@s%r@c%r@u%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@l%r@a%r@m%r@i%r@t%r@y%r@.%r@” %u@5%u@1He entered the house and didn’t allow anyone to enter with him, except for Peter, John, and James, and the child’s father and mother. %u@5%u@2Everyone kept on crying and kept on pounding their chests in a gesture of grief. He said, %r@“%R@D%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@c%r@r%r@y%r@;%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@c%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@s%r@h%r@e%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@—%r@s%r@h%r@e%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@j%r@u%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@l%r@e%r@e%r@p%r@.%r@”%r@ %u@5%u@3They started ridiculing him, having known for certain that she had died. %u@5%u@4He, though, took her hand and called to her loudly, %r@“%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@l%r@a%r@d%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@g%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@!%r@”%r@ %u@5%u@5Her spirit returned to her, and she was resurrected immediately. He left instructions that she be given something to eat. %u@5%u@6Her parents were flabbergasted, but he commanded them not to tell anyone what had happened.%vn~
%sb~
Luke Chapter 9%hb~
          %u@1Having summoned the Twelve, he gave them supernatural power and authority to cure a person of any kind of demon which is harassing him and to cure diseases. %u@2He sent them out as missionaries to go about preaching and proclaiming God’s plan of being involved with mankind (God’s kingdom) and to heal the sick. %u@3He said to them, %r@“%R@D%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@p%r@a%r@c%r@k%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@y%r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@r%r@o%r@a%r@d%r@:%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@a%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@a%r@f%r@f%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@l%r@ %r@p%r@a%r@c%r@k%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@s%r@h%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@c%r@h%r@a%r@n%r@g%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@c%r@l%r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@s%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%R@I%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@v%r@i%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@a%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@l%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@p%r@l%r@a%r@c%r@e%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%R@W%r@h%r@o%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@k%r@n%r@o%r@w%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@c%r@h%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@c%r@e%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@—%r@w%r@h%r@o%r@l%r@e%r@-%r@h%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@a%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@e%r@m%r@b%r@r%r@a%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@a%r@g%r@e%r@—%r@w%r@h%r@i%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@p%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@c%r@i%r@t%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@s%r@h%r@a%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@u%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@f%r@e%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@k%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@n%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@i%r@f%r@y%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@g%r@a%r@i%r@n%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m.” %u@6Entering and leaving, entering and leaving, they proceeded to go through each and every town telling the good news and curing people everywhere they encounter those asking for it.%vn~
          %u@7The ruler Herod heard everything which had happened and was quite perplexed on account of what was being said by some, that John was raised from the dead, %u@8but by some that Elijah has appeared, but by others that the prophet so-and-so from way-back-when came back to life. %u@9Herod said, “I beheaded John myself, so who is this guy that I’m hearing such things about?” He was ever trying to see him.%vn~
          %u@1%u@0When they returned, the missionaries told him all about the things that they did. Taking them with him, they withdrew, he and them only, to a city called Bethsaida. %u@1%u@1Knowing this, the crowd followed him. Welcoming them, he proceeded to speak to them about God’s involvement with mankind (God’s kingdom) and proceeded to heal those needing a cure. %u@1%u@2The day was winding down, so the Twelve approached him and said,%vn~
      “Dismiss the crowd, so that they can go into the surrounding towns and farms, retire for the night, and find provision, since we’re out here in the middle of nowhere.”%vn~
          %u@1%u@3He said to them, “You all give them something to eat.”%vn~
      They said, “We don’t have any more than five loaves of bread and two fishes, unless of course we go and buy food for these people.” %u@1%u@4You see, there were around five thousand men there (not counting women and children). He said to his disciples,%vn~
      “Have them find a nice place to relax and gather into dinner parties of about fifty apiece.”%vn~
          %u@1%u@5They did this, and everyone found a place to relax. %u@1%u@6He took the five loaves and two fishes, looked up into the sky, gave thanks for them, broke the bread, and proceeded to give the loaves and fishes to his disciples to distribute to the crowd. %u@1%u@7Everyone ate until they were full, as much as he or she wanted, and twelve baskets of leftover scraps were picked up by them.%vn~
          %u@1%u@8Now on one occasion, he happened to be praying alone and his disciples came over and joined him. He posed a question to them,%vn~
      %r@“%R@W%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@r%r@o%r@w%r@d%r@s%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@a%r@m%r@?%r@”%r@%vn~
          %u@1%u@9They answered, “John the Baptist. Others say Elijah. Yet others say that you’re some prophet from way-back-when who’s come back to life.”%vn~
          %u@2%u@0He said to them, %r@“%R@W%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@a%r@m%r@?%r@”%vn~
      Peter replied, “God’s Messiah, the Christ.”%vn~
          %u@2%u@1He got them to promise not to spread this fact around to anyone: %u@2%u@2he said that the Man must undergo a lot of suffering and be rejected after examination by the councilmen, the chief priests, and the designated teachers, be killed, and be resurrected on the third day after. %u@2%u@3He went on to tell everyone, %r@“%R@I%r@f%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@y%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@l%r@l%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@o%r@t%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@p%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@n%r@y%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@s%r@e%r@l%r@f%r@ %r@b%r@y%r@ %r@p%r@i%r@c%r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@c%r@r%r@o%r@s%r@s%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@ %r@d%r@a%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@l%r@l%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@k%r@n%r@o%r@w%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@f%r@u%r@l%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@k%r@e%r@e%r@p%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@t%r@a%r@c%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@l%r@f%r@,%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@-%r@b%r@e%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@,%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@r%r@o%r@y%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@.%r@ %R@H%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@m%r@i%r@n%r@d%r@f%r@u%r@l%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@r%r@o%r@y%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@l%r@f%r@,%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@-%r@b%r@e%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@,%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@h%r@a%r@l%r@f%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@k%r@e%r@e%r@p%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@t%r@a%r@c%r@t%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%R@S%r@o%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@w%r@,%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@n%r@e%r@f%r@i%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@f%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@g%r@a%r@i%r@n%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@(%r@i%r@.%r@e%r@.%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@f%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@g%r@r%r@e%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@c%r@c%r@o%r@m%r@p%r@l%r@i%r@s%r@h%r@m%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@s%r@)%r@,%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@r%r@o%r@y%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@ %r@s%r@u%r@f%r@f%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@s%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@w%r@n%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@l%r@f%r@?%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@6%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@k%r@n%r@o%r@w%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@f%r@u%r@l%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@h%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@d%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@M%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@h%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@o%r@n%r@,%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@’%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@g%r@e%r@l%r@s%r@’%r@ %r@g%r@l%r@o%r@r%r@y%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@7%R@M%r@a%r@r%r@k%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@d%r@s%r@—%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@a%r@g%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@g%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@r%r@i%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@a%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@u%r@n%r@t%r@i%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@g%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@p%r@l%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@(%R@G%r@o%r@d%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@d%r@o%r@m%r@)%r@—%r@a%r@b%r@s%r@o%r@l%r@u%r@t%r@e%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~
          %u@2%u@8About eight days after he spoke these words, he took Peter, John, and James with him and ascended a mountain for a session of prayer. %u@2%u@9While he was praying, his facial appearance happened to change, and his clothes also changed to a lightning-like white. %u@3%u@0Just like that, two men began to converse with him, none other than Moses and Elijah, %u@3%u@1who were visible in their glorious magnificence, beginning to speak to him about his departure from the Earth, which was going to be fulfilled in Jerusalem. %u@3%u@2Peter and those with him were dead asleep, but snapped out of it and became wide awake and saw him in his magnificent splendor and the two men standing together with him.%vn~
          %u@3%u@3While they were parting with him, Peter said to Jesus, “Boss, good thing we’re here. Let’s make three little holy edifices, one for you, one for Moses, and one for Elijah”—not having any idea what he was saying. %u@3%u@4While he was still saying this, a cloud appeared and overshadowed them. Fear came upon them as they entered into the cloud. %u@3%u@5A voice appeared out of the cloud saying, “This is my Son, the Chosen-From-Among-Many One, evermore listen to him.” %u@3%u@6With the voice’s appearance, they noticed that Jesus was now alone. For days to come they kept their mouths shut and wouldn’t tell anyone what they had witnessed.%vn~
          %u@3%u@7A large crowd met him the sixth day after they descended the mountain. %u@3%u@8Out of nowhere, a man yelled out from the crowd, “Teacher, I’m begging you to take a look at my son, since he’s the only son I have…”— %u@3%u@9Just like that, a demon spirit takes hold of him, screams all of a sudden, and throws him into a convulsion, foaming at the mouth, hardly leaving him even for a moment, battering him all the while. %u@4%u@0—“…Your disciples were asked to cast it out, and they weren’t able to.” %u@4%u@1Jesus’s response this was, %r@“%R@O%r@h%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@s%r@b%r@e%r@l%r@i%r@e%r@v%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@,%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@r%r@r%r@u%r@p%r@t%r@ %R@Z%r@e%r@i%r@t%r@g%r@e%r@i%r@s%r@t%r@!%r@ %R@J%r@u%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@p%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@?%r@ %R@B%r@r%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@o%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@.%r@”%r@ %u@4%u@2They then brought him over to him; the demon threw him to the ground, and convulsed him. Jesus dropped the hammer on the filthy, disgusting spirit , the child was cured, and they gave him back to his father. %u@4%u@3Everyone was amazed at the magnificence of God.%vn~
      While everyone was still marveling at everything he was doing, he said to his disciples, %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@“%R@A%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@r%r@n%r@e%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@w%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@,%r@ %r@g%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@t%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@:%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@e%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@M%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@t%r@r%r@a%r@y%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@a%r@k%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@t%r@o%r@ %r@c%r@u%r@s%r@t%r@o%r@d%r@y%r@ %r@b%r@y%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@n%r@n%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@.%r@” %u@4%u@5But this remark wasn’t getting through to them. It had been hidden from them, kept locked up as a secret from them, so they weren’t seeing it for what it was, and from time to time when they thought about this remark were afraid to ask him about it.%vn~
          %u@4%u@6Now an argument arose between them, namely which one of them is the greatest. %u@4%u@7Jesus, understanding what was at the heart of the issue, got ahold of a child, had him stand next to him, %u@4%u@8and said to them, %r@“%R@W%r@h%r@o%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@c%r@e%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@c%r@h%r@i%r@l%r@d%r@—%r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@l%r@e%r@h%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@l%r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@n%r@s%r@i%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@w%r@n%r@—%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@p%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %R@C%r@h%r@r%r@i%r@s%r@t%r@i%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@d%r@u%r@t%r@y%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@c%r@e%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@c%r@e%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@c%r@e%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@O%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@.%r@ %R@T%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@c%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@m%r@o%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@a%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@w%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@a%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@—%r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@g%r@r%r@e%r@a%r@t%r@.%r@”%vn~
          %u@4%u@9Upon reflection, John said, “Boss, we saw some people casting out demons as though they were authorized and commissioned to do so by you, and time and time again we prevented them or otherwise hindered them from doing so, because their initiative didn’t originate from us.” %u@5%u@0He said to John, %r@“%R@D%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@n%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@.%r@ %R@T%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@c%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@p%r@p%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@u%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@d%r@e%r@.%r@”%vn~
          %u@5%u@1As those days were coming to a close, the days before his ascension, in his inner self he mustered an unwavering determination for going to Jerusalem and enduring the hardships there. %u@5%u@2He sent out some agents to the places he was intent on going and was expecting confrontation. In their comings and goings, they went into the towns of Samaria as part of their making preparations for him, %u@5%u@3but they didn’t whole-heartedly welcome him and embrace his ministry there, because he was bent on going to Jerusalem. %u@5%u@4When his disciples witnessed this, James and John said, “Lord, do you want us to call fire down from the sky and incinerate them?” %u@5%u@5He turned and scolded them, %u@5%u@6and they went to another town instead.%vn~
          %u@5%u@7While they were on the road, someone said to him, “I’ll follow you wherever you decide to go.” %u@5%u@8Jesus said to him, %r@“%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@x%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@n%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@b%r@i%r@r%r@d%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@n%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@M%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@e%r@s%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@y%r@ %r@s%r@u%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@p%r@l%r@a%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@g%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@w%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@.%r@”%r@ %u@5%u@9He said to someone else, %r@“%R@B%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@l%r@l%r@o%r@w%r@e%r@r%r@,%r@”%r@ but he said, “Lord, let me first go out and bury my father.” %u@6%u@0He said, %r@“%R@L%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@r%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@i%r@r%r@ %r@o%r@w%r@n%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@;%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@u%r@g%r@h%r@,%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@o%r@c%r@l%r@a%r@i%r@m%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@v%r@o%r@l%r@v%r@e%r@m%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ someone else, “I’ll be your follower, Lord, but first let me say farewell to close friends and family.” %u@6%u@2Jesus said to him, %r@“%R@N%r@o%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@p%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@o%r@k%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@a%r@c%r@k%r@ %r@o%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@s%r@h%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@d%r@w%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %sb~
Luke Chapter 10%hb~
          %u@1After these things happened, the Lord appointed seventy-two others and sent them out in sets of twos as probes into every city and place which he personally intended to visit. %u@2He started his talk by saying to them, %r@“%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@r%r@v%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@l%r@a%r@r%r@g%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@d%r@e%r@e%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@k%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@e%r@w%r@.%r@ %R@T%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@f%r@o%r@r%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@k%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@H%r@a%r@r%r@v%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@ %R@C%r@h%r@i%r@e%r@f%r@ %r@i%r@f%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@t%r@a%r@p%r@u%r@l%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@k%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@t%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@r%r@v%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@—%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%R@G%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@!%r@%vn~
      %r@“%R@T%r@a%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@e%r@:%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@n%r@d%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@l%r@a%r@m%r@b%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@l%r@ %r@p%r@a%r@c%r@k%r@,%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@a%r@l%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@a%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@o%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@n%r@d%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@y%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@r%r@o%r@a%r@d%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%R@N%r@o%r@w%r@,%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@p%r@p%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@e%r@n%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@,%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@r%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@I%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@n%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@g%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@o%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@)%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@6%R@I%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@p%r@p%r@e%r@n%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@a%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@(%r@i%r@.%r@e%r@.%r@,%r@ %r@i%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@O%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@w%r@i%r@s%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@o%r@u%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@a%r@c%r@k%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@7%R@S%r@t%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@v%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@e%r@a%r@t%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@d%r@r%r@i%r@n%r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@;%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@k%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@8%R@I%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@p%r@p%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@t%r@o%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@c%r@i%r@t%r@y%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@e%r@m%r@b%r@r%r@a%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@m%r@i%r@n%r@i%r@s%r@t%r@r%r@y%r@—%r@e%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@           %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@9%r@”%R@H%r@e%r@a%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@i%r@t%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@r%r@u%r@n%r@d%r@o%r@w%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@ %r@i%r@l%r@l%r@n%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@r%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@G%r@o%r@d%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@v%r@o%r@l%r@v%r@e%r@m%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@k%r@i%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@(%R@G%r@o%r@d%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@d%r@o%r@m%r@)%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@a%r@c%r@h%r@.%r@’%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@0%R@B%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@s%r@h%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@t%r@o%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@c%r@i%r@t%r@y%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@c%r@e%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@w%r@n%r@ %r@s%r@q%r@u%r@a%r@r%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@e%r@v%r@a%r@r%r@d%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@p%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@u%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@i%r@t%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@c%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@           %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@”%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@e%r@p%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@o%r@u%r@b%r@l%r@e%r@,%r@ %R@C%r@h%r@o%r@r%r@a%r@z%r@i%r@n%r@!%r@ %R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@e%r@p%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@o%r@u%r@b%r@l%r@e%r@ %R@B%r@e%r@t%r@h%r@s%r@a%r@i%r@d%r@a%r@!%r@ %R@B%r@e%r@c%r@a%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@i%r@r%r@a%r@c%r@l%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@o%r@c%r@c%r@u%r@r%r@r%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@m%r@o%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@p%r@p%r@e%r@n%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %R@T%r@y%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %R@S%r@i%r@d%r@o%r@n%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@i%r@t%r@i%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@’%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@r%r@l%r@a%r@p%r@-%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@-%r@a%r@s%r@h%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@c%r@h%r@a%r@n%r@g%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@n%r@d%r@u%r@c%r@t%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%R@I%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@y%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@,%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %R@T%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %R@D%r@a%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@o%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@l%r@e%r@r%r@a%r@b%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %R@T%r@y%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %R@S%r@i%r@d%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%R@A%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@,%r@ %R@C%r@a%r@p%r@e%r@r%r@n%r@a%r@u%r@m%r@,%r@%vn~

%r@“%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@l%r@e%r@v%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@%vp~

%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@6%r@”%R@H%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@n%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@n%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@s%r@r%r@e%r@g%r@a%r@r%r@d%r@s%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@s%r@r%r@e%r@g%r@a%r@r%r@d%r@s%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@s%r@r%r@e%r@g%r@a%r@r%r@d%r@s%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@s%r@r%r@e%r@g%r@a%r@r%r@d%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@O%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@.%r@”%r@%nn~
          %u@1%u@7The seventy-two returned full of joy saying, “Lord, even the demons obey us when we act using your delegated authority.” %u@1%u@8He said to them, %r@“%R@T%r@i%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@i%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@g%r@a%r@i%r@n%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@w%r@,%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@n%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@r%r@i%r@k%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@m%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@g%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@e%r@j%r@e%r@c%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@s%r@p%r@i%r@r%r@i%r@t%r@u%r@a%r@l%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@m%r@i%r@n%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@9%R@R%r@e%r@a%r@l%r@i%r@z%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@:%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@u%r@t%r@h%r@o%r@r%r@i%r@t%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@l%r@k%r@ %r@o%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@r%r@p%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@c%r@o%r@r%r@p%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@o%r@w%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@n%r@e%r@m%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@r%r@m%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@,%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@b%r@i%r@t%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@0%R@H%r@o%r@w%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@,%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@g%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@o%r@ %r@e%r@x%r@c%r@i%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@b%r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@c%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@o%r@b%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@j%r@o%r@i%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@l%r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@p%r@i%r@r%r@i%r@t%r@u%r@a%r@l%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@l%r@d%r@.%r@”%vn~
          %u@2%u@1At that moment he was filled with rapture in the Holy Spirit and said, %r@“%R@I%r@ %r@p%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@n%r@f%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@,%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@,%r@ %R@L%r@o%r@r%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@e%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@h%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@i%r@g%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@a%r@l%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@c%r@h%r@i%r@l%r@d%r@r%r@e%r@n%r@.%r@ %R@Y%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@d%r@e%r@e%r@d%r@,%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@,%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@a%r@m%r@ %r@e%r@n%r@r%r@a%r@p%r@t%r@u%r@r%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@c%r@a%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@u%r@r%r@n%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@p%r@l%r@e%r@a%r@s%r@e%r@ %R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@t%r@e%r@n%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@o%r@f%r@o%r@u%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@c%r@r%r@u%r@t%r@i%r@n%r@y%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%R@A%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@g%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@y%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@k%r@n%r@o%r@w%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@e%r@x%r@c%r@e%r@p%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@e%r@x%r@c%r@e%r@p%r@t%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@e%r@x%r@c%r@e%r@p%r@t%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@m%r@i%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@ %r@c%r@h%r@o%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@a%r@l%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@.%r@”%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%R@H%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@u%r@r%r@n%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@c%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@s%r@c%r@i%r@p%r@l%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@i%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@“%R@B%r@l%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@y%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%R@I%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@m%r@u%r@c%r@h%r@:%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@y%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@o%r@p%r@h%r@e%r@t%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@s%r@i%r@r%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@d%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@g%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@d%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@g%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@.%r@”%vn~
          %u@2%u@5As chance would have it, some expert in the Law of Moses stood up and put him on the spot saying,%vn~
      “Teacher, what must one do to legitimately claim and lay hold of that special fullness of life (eternal life)?”%vn~
          %u@2%u@6He said to him, %r@“%R@W%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@e%r@s%r@t%r@a%r@b%r@l%r@i%r@s%r@h%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@r%r@i%r@t%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@b%r@y%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@c%r@r%r@e%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@b%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@L%r@a%r@w%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %R@M%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@s%r@?%r@”%vn~
          %u@2%u@7His response to him was, “’You shall love the Lord your God from out of your entire heart, with your entire mind, will, and emotions, with your entire ability and might, and with your entire intellect.’ Also, ‘You shall love your neighbor as yourself.’”%vn~
          %u@2%u@8He said, %r@“%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@s%r@w%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@r%r@r%r@e%r@c%r@t%r@l%r@y%r@.%r@ %R@D%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@s%r@h%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@n%r@a%r@l%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@.%r@”%vn~
          %u@2%u@9But wanting to vindicate (or exculpate) himself, he said to Jesus, “So who is my neighbor?”%vn~
          %u@3%u@0Jesus formulated a reply for him: %r@“%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@c%r@e%r@r%r@t%r@a%r@i%r@n%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@“%R@G%r@o%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@.%r@”%vn~
          %u@3%u@8While they were travelling about, he himself and not just his disciples entered a certain town. A woman named Martha was entertaining him, %u@3%u@9and this woman had a sister named Mary, who moreover was sitting near the Lord attentively, listening on and on to his message. %u@4%u@0But Martha was constantly being distracted by what was involved in the preparations and waiting on everyone. She went straight up to him and said, “Lord, don’t you care that my sister has left me with all the work? So now, say something to her to get her to help out.” %u@4%u@1His response to her was, %r@“%R@M%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@h%r@a%r@,%r@ %R@M%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@h%r@a%r@,%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@r%r@y%r@ %r@a%r@b%r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@g%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@s%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@b%r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%R@T%r@o%r@ %r@c%r@h%r@o%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@n%r@e%r@e%r@d%r@e%r@d%r@.%r@ %R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@,%r@ %R@M%r@a%r@r%r@y%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@n%r@s%r@i%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@o%r@p%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@d%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@c%r@h%r@o%r@i%r@c%r@e%r@;%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@v%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@s%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@h%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@a%r@k%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@w%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@r%r@.%r@”%vn~
%sb~
Luke Chapter 11%hb~
          %u@1He happened to be praying somewhere, and just as he finished one of his disciples said to him, “Lord, teach us how to pray, just as John taught his disciples.” %u@2He said to them, %r@“%R@W%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@a%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@y%r@,%r@%vn~

%r@%si~
          %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%R@H%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@i%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@,%r@ %r@“%R@A%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@o%r@b%r@a%r@b%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@i%r@e%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@i%r@d%r@d%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@n%r@i%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@H%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@d%r@d%r@y%r@,%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@n%r@e%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@b%r@o%r@r%r@r%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@r%r@e%r@e%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@b%r@r%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@6%r@s%r@i%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@           %u@1%u@4He was in the middle of casting out a deaf demon (i.e. a demon of deafness), and it so happened that when the demon left, the deaf man spoke. The crowd was amazed. %u@1%u@5But some of them said, “He casts out demons by the head demon himself, Beelzebub.” %u@1%u@6But others, testing him in order to expose a fault, time and time again were trying to get him to perform a spectacular miracle. %u@1%u@7He, though, cognizant of the inclination behind their thoughts, said to them, %r@“%R@E%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@d%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@g%r@a%r@n%r@i%r@z%r@a%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@p%r@i%r@t%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@g%r@a%r@i%r@n%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@g%r@a%r@n%r@i%r@z%r@a%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@s%r@e%r@l%r@f%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@8%R@N%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@i%r@f%r@ %R@S%r@a%r@t%r@a%r@n%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@m%r@i%r@n%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@           %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@”%R@W%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@m%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@l%r@t%r@ %r@g%r@u%r@a%r@r%r@d%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@w%r@n%r@ %r@f%r@e%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@d%r@-%r@i%r@n%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@o%r@p%r@e%r@r%r@t%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@k%r@e%r@e%r@p%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@ %r@e%r@y%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@i%r@m%r@e%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@p%r@o%r@s%r@s%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@s%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@m%r@a%r@i%r@n%r@ %r@u%r@n%r@d%r@i%r@s%r@t%r@u%r@r%r@b%r@e%r@d%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%R@A%r@s%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@m%r@o%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@o%r@w%r@e%r@r%r@f%r@u%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@s%r@a%r@u%r@l%r@t%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@u%r@b%r@d%r@u%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@,%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@n%r@f%r@i%r@s%r@c%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@a%r@p%r@o%r@n%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@m%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@l%r@i%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@s%r@t%r@r%r@i%r@b%r@u%r@t%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@p%r@o%r@s%r@s%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@p%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@n%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@c%r@r%r@i%r@m%r@e%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%R@W%r@h%r@o%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@g%r@a%r@i%r@n%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@n%r@t%r@r%r@i%r@b%r@u%r@t%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@t%r@r%r@a%r@c%r@t%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@.%r@%vn~
          %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@”%R@W%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@c%r@h%r@e%r@t%r@y%r@p%r@i%r@c%r@a%r@l%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@l%r@t%r@h%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%R@I%r@t%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@n%r@d%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@           %u@2%u@7It so happened that, when he was in the middle of saying these things, a woman lifted her voice over the crowd, “Blessed be the womb that carried you through pregnancy and the breast that breast-fed you.” %u@2%u@8He, though, said, %r@“%R@O%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@n%r@t%r@r%r@a%r@r%r@y%r@—%r@b%r@l%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@g%r@u%r@a%r@r%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@t%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@o%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@k%r@e%r@e%r@p%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@.%r@”%vn~
          %u@2%u@9As the crowd built up more and more, he proceeded to say, %r@“%R@T%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@e%r@v%r@a%r@i%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %R@Z%r@e%r@i%r@t%r@g%r@e%r@i%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@p%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@i%r@c%r@u%r@l%r@a%r@r%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@i%r@l%r@.%r@ %R@I%r@t%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@k%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@s%r@p%r@e%r@c%r@t%r@a%r@c%r@u%r@l%r@a%r@r%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %R@J%r@o%r@n%r@a%r@h%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@m%r@i%r@r%r@a%r@c%r@l%r@e%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@0%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@j%r@u%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@ %R@J%r@o%r@n%r@a%r@h%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@c%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@g%r@n%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@N%r@i%r@n%r@e%r@v%r@i%r@t%r@e%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@M%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@o%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@m%r@i%r@l%r@a%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@y%r@p%r@e%r@ %R@Z%r@e%r@i%r@t%r@g%r@e%r@i%r@s%r@t%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@Q%r@u%r@e%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %R@S%r@h%r@e%r@b%r@a%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@v%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@ %r@p%r@l%r@a%r@c%r@e%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %R@N%r@i%r@n%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@h%r@           %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@”%R@N%r@o%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@l%r@a%r@m%r@p%r@ %r@p%r@l%r@a%r@c%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@t%r@t%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@s%r@c%r@i%r@n%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@(%r@i%r@.%r@e%r@.%r@,%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@x%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@b%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@)%r@,%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@6%R@S%r@o%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@w%r@,%r@ %r@i%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@e%r@n%r@t%r@i%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@o%r@d%r@y%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@d%r@a%r@r%r@k%r@,%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@l%r@l%r@u%r@m%r@i%r@n%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@e%r@n%r@t%r@i%r@r%r@e%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@
