%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@u%r@m%r@i%r@n%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@o%r@u%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~
          %u@3%u@7During the talk, the Pharisees asked him if he would dine with them, so he entered the house where the dinner was being held and had a seat at the table. %u@3%u@8Seeing this, the Pharisees were stunned because he hadn’t first been immersed in water before the meal. %u@3%u@9The Lord said to them, %r@“%R@R%r@i%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@o%r@u%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@w%r@,%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %R@P%r@h%r@a%r@r%r@i%r@s%r@e%r@e%r@s%r@—%r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@c%r@l%r@e%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@s%r@i%r@d%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@u%r@p%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@s%r@h%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@s%r@i%r@d%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@r%r@i%r@m%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@a%r@v%r@a%r@r%r@i%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@i%r@q%r@u%r@i%r@t%r@y%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@0%R@S%r@t%r@u%r@p%r@i%r@d%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@o%r@p%r@l%r@e%r@.%r@ %R@D%r@i%r@d%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %R@H%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@d%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@s%r@i%r@d%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@u%r@p%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@s%r@o%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@s%r@i%r@d%r@e%r@?%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%R@J%r@u%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@g%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@w%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@s%r@i%r@d%r@e%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@i%r@v%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@g%r@i%r@f%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@c%r@h%r@a%r@r%r@i%r@t%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@—%r@p%r@r%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@o%r@—%r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@y%r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@f%r@-%r@l%r@i%r@m%r@i%r@t%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@r%r@i%r@t%r@u%r@a%r@l%r@i%r@s%r@t%r@i%r@c%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@p%r@e%r@c%r@t%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~
          %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@”%R@E%r@n%r@o%r@u%r@g%r@h%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@—%r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %R@P%r@h%r@a%r@r%r@i%r@s%r@e%r@e%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@c%r@a%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@n%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@s%r@m%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@r%r@c%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@a%r@g%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@m%r@i%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@r%r@u%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@r%r@b%r@ %r@i%r@m%r@a%r@g%r@i%r@n%r@a%r@b%r@l%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@l%r@o%r@o%r@k%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@ %r@f%r@l%r@a%r@t%r@-%r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@g%r@n%r@o%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@j%r@u%r@d%r@g%r@m%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@;%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@k%r@n%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@u%r@p%r@p%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@i%r@a%r@l%r@i%r@z%r@e%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %R@P%r@h%r@a%r@r%r@i%r@s%r@e%r@e%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@c%r@a%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@a%r@t%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@n%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@y%r@n%r@a%r@g%r@o%r@g%r@u%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@r%r@e%r@e%r@t%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@r%r@k%r@e%r@t%r@p%r@l%r@a%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@w%r@n%r@-%r@s%r@q%r@u%r@a%r@r%r@e%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@c%r@a%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@O%r@u%r@t%r@-%r@o%r@f%r@-%R@S%r@i%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@-%R@T%r@o%r@m%r@b%r@s%r@:%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@o%r@p%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@l%r@k%r@ %r@o%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@p%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@u%r@n%r@a%r@w%r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~
          %u@4%u@5One of the experts in the Law of Moses then retorts, “Teacher, these words insult us as well.” %u@4%u@6Jesus said, “%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@o%r@,%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %R@L%r@a%r@w%r@ %r@e%r@x%r@p%r@e%r@r%r@t%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@c%r@a%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@d%r@d%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@o%r@p%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@r%r@d%r@e%r@n%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@o%r@ %r@g%r@r%r@e%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@;%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@,%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@a%r@n%r@w%r@h%r@i%r@l%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@f%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@a%r@t%r@t%r@e%r@m%r@p%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@r%r@d%r@e%r@n%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@7%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@c%r@a%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@e%r@r%r@e%r@c%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@o%r@p%r@h%r@e%r@t%r@s%r@’%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@m%r@b%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@e%r@d%r@e%r@c%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@o%r@r%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@8%R@C%r@o%r@n%r@s%r@e%r@q%r@u%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@l%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@a%r@f%r@f%r@i%r@r%r@m%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@p%r@p%r@r%r@o%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@e%r@d%r@e%r@c%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@o%r@r%r@s%r@’%r@ %r@a%r@c%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@“%R@I%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@o%r@p%r@h%r@e%r@t%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@m%r@i%r@s%r@s%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@a%r@r%r@i%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@,%r@%vp~
%R@A%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@e%r@c%r@u%r@t%r@e%r@%vp~

%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@0%r@”%r@…%R@R%r@e%r@s%r@u%r@l%r@t%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@d%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %R@Z%r@e%r@i%r@t%r@g%r@e%r@i%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@c%r@c%r@o%r@u%r@n%r@t%r@a%r@b%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@l%r@o%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@o%r@p%r@h%r@e%r@t%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@p%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %R@A%r@b%r@e%r@l%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@l%r@o%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %R@Z%r@e%r@c%r@h%r@a%r@r%r@i%r@a%r@h%r@,%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@s%r@e%r@l%r@f%r@.%r@ %R@Y%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@d%r@e%r@e%r@d%r@,%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@a%r@d%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@e%r@v%r@a%r@i%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %R@Z%r@e%r@i%r@t%r@g%r@e%r@i%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@c%r@c%r@o%r@u%r@n%r@t%r@a%r@b%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@,%r@ %r@e%r@x%r@p%r@e%r@r%r@t%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@c%r@a%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@o%r@k%r@ %r@a%r@w%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@k%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@k%r@n%r@o%r@w%r@l%r@e%r@d%r@g%r@e%r@;%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@o%r@w%r@n%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@l%r@v%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@r%r@n%r@e%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@j%r@o%r@i%r@n%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@k%r@n%r@o%r@w%r@l%r@e%r@d%r@g%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@b%r@i%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@ %r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@w%r@i%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@n%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@o%r@c%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@j%r@o%r@i%r@n%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@.%r@”%r@%nn~
          %u@5%u@3After he left the house, from there on out, the experts in the Law and the Pharisees held a terrible grudge against him, and over and over tried to get him to make off-the-cuff remarks, questioning him about many things, %u@5%u@4plotting in order to catch him in something which he blurted out of his mouth which was wrong.%vn~
%sb~
Luke Chapter 12%hb~
          %u@1As the crowd was aggregating into the thousands, to the point where they were stepping on each other, first and foremost he started off by speaking to his disciples, %r@“%R@B%r@e%r@w%r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@e%r@a%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@(%r@i%r@.%r@e%r@.%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@y%r@p%r@o%r@c%r@r%r@i%r@s%r@y%r@)%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@P%r@h%r@a%r@r%r@i%r@s%r@e%r@e%r@s%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%R@N%r@o%r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@a%r@l%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@a%r@l%r@e%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@c%r@r%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@d%r@e%r@ %r@k%r@n%r@o%r@w%r@n%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%R@I%r@n%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@s%r@p%r@e%r@a%r@k%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@a%r@r%r@k%r@n%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@;%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@p%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@a%r@r%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@e%r@a%r@c%r@h%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@r%r@o%r@o%r@f%r@t%r@o%r@p%r@s%r@.%r@%vn~
          %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@”%R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@s%r@p%r@e%r@a%r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@c%r@l%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@i%r@e%r@n%r@d%r@s%r@:%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@f%r@r%r@a%r@i%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@o%r@d%r@y%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@f%r@u%r@r%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%R@I%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@s%r@h%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@f%r@r%r@a%r@i%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@:%r@ %r@f%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@f%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@,%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@u%r@t%r@h%r@o%r@r%r@i%r@t%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@m%r@i%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@.%r@ %R@O%r@h%r@ %r@y%r@e%r@s%r@,%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@—%r@f%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@o%r@n%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@6%R@D%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@p%r@a%r@r%r@r%r@o%r@w%r@s%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@$%r@6%r@?%r@ %R@A%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@g%r@o%r@t%r@t%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@e%r@f%r@r%r@o%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@m%r@i%r@n%r@d%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@7%R@N%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@i%r@r%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@           %u@1%u@3From out of the crowd someone said, “Teacher, tell my brother to split the family inheritance with me.” %u@1%u@4He said, %r@“%R@M%r@i%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@,%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@a%r@p%r@p%r@o%r@i%r@n%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@j%r@u%r@d%r@g%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@b%r@i%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@o%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@?%r@” %u@1%u@5He said to them, %r@“%R@B%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@o%r@k%r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@o%r@t%r@e%r@c%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@s%r@e%r@l%r@f%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@y%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@r%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@g%r@r%r@e%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@(%r@g%r@r%r@a%r@b%r@b%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@a%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@m%r@o%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@p%r@o%r@r%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@)%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@c%r@a%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@u%r@r%r@s%r@u%r@i%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@e%r@x%r@c%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@ %r@p%r@o%r@s%r@s%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@r%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@c%r@c%r@u%r@m%r@u%r@l%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@.%r@”%vn~
          %u@1%u@6He told them an analogy, %r@“%R@S%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@r%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@o%r@w%r@n%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@l%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@           %u@2%u@2He said to his disciples, %r@“%R@F%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@a%r@s%r@o%r@n%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@:%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@m%r@i%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@e%r@m%r@o%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@x%r@i%r@o%r@u%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@b%r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@e%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@ %r@i%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@y%r@ %r@c%r@l%r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@c%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@,%r@           %u@4%u@1Peter said, “Lord, are you directing this analogy at us only or at everyone?” %u@4%u@2The Lord said, %r@“%R@J%r@u%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@w%r@           %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@9%r@”%R@I%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@b%r@l%r@a%r@z%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %R@I%r@           %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@7%r@”%R@A%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@y%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@s%r@o%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@c%r@i%r@d%r@e%r@           %u@1Now during that same timeframe, some people who were present were telling him the news about the Galileans whom Pilate was responsible for their being slaughtered. %u@2He thought about it and replied, %r@“%R@D%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@s%r@u%r@p%r@p%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@s%r@e%r@ %R@G%r@a%r@l%r@i%r@l%r@e%r@a%r@n%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%R@O%r@r%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@i%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@e%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@o%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %R@S%r@i%r@l%r@o%r@a%r@m%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@w%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@f%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@p%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@e%r@d%r@:%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@s%r@u%r@p%r@p%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%R@C%r@e%r@r%r@t%r@a%r@i%r@n%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@.%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@:%r@ %r@p%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@i%r@d%r@e%r@—%r@i%r@f%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@c%r@h%r@a%r@n%r@g%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@y%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@t%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@,%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@r%r@i%r@s%r@h%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@.%r@”%vn~
          %u@6He proceeded to tell them this analogy: %r@“%R@S%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@p%r@l%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@e%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@g%r@a%r@r%r@d%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@o%r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@g%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@d%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@u%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@y%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@7%R@S%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@i%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@a%r@r%r@d%r@e%r@n%r@e%r@r%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@G%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@s%r@u%r@e%r@.%r@ %R@F%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@r%r@e%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@s%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@w%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@o%r@k%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@g%r@s%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@o%r@d%r@u%r@c%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@b%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@e%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@u%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@y%r@.%r@ %R@S%r@o%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@w%r@,%r@ %r@c%r@h%r@o%r@p%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@w%r@n%r@,%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@p%r@a%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@p%r@l%r@e%r@t%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@i%r@l%r@.%r@’%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@8%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@a%r@r%r@d%r@e%r@n%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@n%r@s%r@i%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@p%r@l%r@i%r@e%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@B%r@o%r@s%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@y%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@;%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@a%r@n%r@w%r@h%r@i%r@l%r@e%r@,%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@g%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@o%r@u%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@p%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@w%r@n%r@ %r@f%r@e%r@r%r@t%r@i%r@l%r@i%r@z%r@e%r@r%r@,%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@9%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@f%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@o%r@d%r@u%r@c%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@g%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@.%r@ %R@B%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@f%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@e%r@s%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@,%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@c%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@w%r@n%r@.%r@’%r@”%vn~
          %u@1%u@0On multiple Sabbaths he was teaching in one of the synagogues. %u@1%u@1Attention was directed to a woman who had had a filthy, disgusting spirit for eighteen years, who was bent over and wasn’t able to straighten herself out anymore. %u@1%u@2Seeing her, Jesus called over to her, %r@“%R@W%r@o%r@m%r@a%r@n%r@,%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@l%r@e%r@a%r@s%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@i%r@l%r@l%r@n%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@.%r@”%r@ %u@1%u@3He laid his hands on her and immediately she was restored and was glorifying God and glorifying God. %u@1%u@4The head of the synagogue considered what had happened and became indignant that Jesus treated someone on the Sabbath. He proceeded to tell the crowd, “There are six days in the week in which work can be done; so then, go treat people on those days and not on the Sabbath.” %u@1%u@5The Lord replied, %r@“%R@H%r@y%r@p%r@o%r@c%r@r%r@i%r@t%r@e%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@u%r@n%r@f%r@e%r@t%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@x%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@n%r@k%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@d%r@r%r@i%r@n%r@k%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@S%r@a%r@b%r@b%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@?%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@6%R@T%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@m%r@a%r@n%r@—%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@m%r@o%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@h%r@e%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@s%r@c%r@e%r@n%r@d%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %R@A%r@b%r@r%r@a%r@h%r@a%r@m%r@—%r@w%r@h%r@o%r@m%r@ %R@S%r@a%r@t%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@o%r@u%r@n%r@d%r@—%r@g%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@—%r@t%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@e%r@i%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@s%r@—%r@o%r@u%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@ %r@s%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@u%r@n%r@f%r@e%r@t%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@o%r@n%r@d%r@a%r@g%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@d%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@p%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@i%r@c%r@u%r@l%r@a%r@r%r@,%r@ %r@n%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@S%r@a%r@b%r@b%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@?%r@”%r@ %u@1%u@7Saying these things, all those opposing him were humiliated, and the entire crowd began to rejoice over all the wonderful things he was causing to happen.%vn~
          %u@1%u@8Thereupon he proceeded to say, %r@“%R@T%r@o%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@v%r@o%r@l%r@v%r@e%r@m%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@k%r@i%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@(%R@G%r@o%r@d%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@d%r@o%r@m%r@)%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@p%r@a%r@r%r@a%r@b%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@?%r@ %R@A%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@p%r@a%r@r%r@i%r@s%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@?%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@9%R@I%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@p%r@a%r@r%r@a%r@b%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@m%r@u%r@s%r@t%r@a%r@r%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@o%r@k%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@u%r@c%r@k%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@g%r@a%r@r%r@d%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@b%r@y%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@s%r@e%r@l%r@f%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@g%r@r%r@e%r@w%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@s%r@u%r@m%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@m%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@e%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@i%r@r%r@d%r@s%r@ %r@n%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@m%r@o%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@r%r@a%r@n%r@c%r@h%r@e%r@s%r@.%r@” %u@2%u@0Again he said, %r@“%R@T%r@o%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@d%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@p%r@a%r@r%r@a%r@b%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@?%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%R@I%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@p%r@a%r@r%r@a%r@b%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@b%r@r%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@y%r@e%r@a%r@s%r@t%r@,%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@m%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@o%r@k%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@r%r@i%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@l%r@a%r@r%r@g%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@i%r@x%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@b%r@o%r@w%r@l%r@-%r@s%r@i%r@z%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@b%r@a%r@t%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@u%r@g%r@h%r@,%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@d%r@d%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@,%r@ %r@u%r@n%r@t%r@i%r@l%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@t%r@i%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@n%r@t%r@i%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@a%r@t%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@f%r@e%r@r%r@m%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@.%r@”%vn~
          %u@2%u@2He travelled throughout continuously, teaching from city to city and town to town, making his way to Jerusalem. %u@2%u@3Someone said to him, “Lord, sure are just a few people being saved (i.e., repenting, receiving healing, having demons cast out of them), aren’t there?” He told them, %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@”%R@S%r@t%r@r%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@—%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@n%r@t%r@e%r@n%r@d%r@—%r@t%r@o%r@ %r@e%r@n%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@r%r@o%r@u%r@g%r@h%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@n%r@a%r@r%r@r%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@o%r@r%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@c%r@a%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@—%R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@—%r@m%r@a%r@n%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@e%r@n%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@b%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@c%r@h%r@a%r@r%r@g%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@c%r@i%r@d%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@i%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@l%r@a%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@r%r@o%r@u%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@h%r@u%r@t%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@o%r@r%r@,%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@w%r@a%r@r%r@d%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@i%r@f%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@o%r@p%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@o%r@c%r@e%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@s%r@i%r@d%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@k%r@n%r@o%r@c%r@k%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@w%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@,%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@a%r@c%r@t%r@i%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@w%r@r%r@o%r@n%r@g%r@-%r@d%r@o%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@.%r@’%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@8%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@e%r@p%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %R@A%r@b%r@r%r@a%r@h%r@a%r@m%r@,%r@ %R@I%r@s%r@a%r@a%r@c%r@,%r@ %R@J%r@a%r@c%r@o%r@b%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@o%r@p%r@h%r@e%r@t%r@s%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@n%r@n%r@e%r@c%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@v%r@o%r@l%r@v%r@e%r@m%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@k%r@i%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@(%R@G%r@o%r@d%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@d%r@o%r@m%r@)%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@n%r@.%r@ %R@T%r@h%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@o%r@p%r@l%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@u%r@g%r@h%r@,%r@ %r@g%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@o%r@o%r@t%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@9%R@F%r@o%r@l%r@k%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@N%r@o%r@r%r@t%r@h%r@,%r@ %R@S%r@o%r@u%r@t%r@h%r@,%r@ %R@E%r@a%r@s%r@t%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %R@W%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@p%r@l%r@a%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@ %r@a%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@n%r@n%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@a%r@b%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@p%r@l%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@k%r@i%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@a%r@l%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@(%r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@d%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@)%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@0%R@A%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@g%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@:%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@l%r@a%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@r%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@r%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@l%r@a%r@s%r@t%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~
          %u@3%u@1About that time, some Pharisees arrived telling him, “Go now, get away from here, because Herod wants to kill you.” %u@3%u@2He told them, %r@“%R@G%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@x%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@I%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@s%r@t%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@m%r@o%r@n%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@m%r@i%r@n%r@i%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@d%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@m%r@o%r@r%r@r%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@n%r@i%r@s%r@h%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@n%r@e%r@x%r@t%r@ %r@d%r@a%r@y%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%R@N%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@l%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@,%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@g%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@w%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@d%r@a%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@m%r@o%r@r%r@r%r@o%r@w%r@,%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@n%r@e%r@x%r@t%r@ %r@d%r@a%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@p%r@o%r@s%r@s%r@i%r@b%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@o%r@p%r@h%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@n%r@i%r@h%r@i%r@l%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@s%r@i%r@d%r@e%r@ %R@J%r@e%r@r%r@u%r@s%r@a%r@l%r@e%r@m%r@.%r@’%r@ %r@%vn~
          %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@”%R@J%r@e%r@r%r@u%r@s%r@a%r@l%r@e%r@m%r@…%R@J%r@e%r@r%r@u%r@s%r@a%r@l%r@e%r@m%r@…%r@s%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@o%r@p%r@h%r@e%r@t%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@r%r@:%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@t%r@e%r@n%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@g%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@h%r@a%r@b%r@i%r@t%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@s%r@e%r@l%r@f%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@g%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@o%r@w%r@n%r@ %r@c%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@k%r@s%r@ %r@u%r@n%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%R@J%r@u%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@,%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@h%r@e%r@s%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@t%r@r%r@o%r@p%r@o%r@l%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@f%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@o%r@w%r@n%r@ %r@u%r@n%r@d%r@o%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@.%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@s%r@o%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@u%r@n%r@t%r@i%r@l%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@p%r@p%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@B%r@l%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@L%r@o%r@r%r@d%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@h%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@.%r@’%r@”%vn~
%sb~
Luke Chapter 14%hb~
          %u@1He happened to go to the house of some high-up Pharisee for a meal on the Sabbath, and they were watching every step that he made. %u@2As it turned out, somebody there right in front of him was afflicted with dropsy. %u@3Jesus thought a bit and said to the experts in the Law of Moses and to the Pharisees, %r@“%R@I%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@o%r@w%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@o%r@w%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@l%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@S%r@a%r@b%r@b%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@?%r@” %u@4They kept silent. He laid hold of him, healed him, and let him go. %u@5He said to them, %r@“%R@W%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@o%r@w%r@n%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@n%r@k%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@t%r@o%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@p%r@u%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@r%r@i%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@w%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@i%r@f%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@ %R@S%r@a%r@b%r@b%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@?%r@”%r@ %u@6They weren’t able to refute this.%vn~
          %u@7He proceeded to tell an analogy to the guests, mindful of how the places of honor at the table, those seats reserved for the most important guests, were being considered and chosen. %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@8%r@“%R@W%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@p%r@p%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@g%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@v%r@i%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@b%r@y%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@d%r@d%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@,%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@a%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@n%r@o%r@r%r@,%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@g%r@u%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@g%r@a%r@r%r@d%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@ %r@m%r@o%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@m%r@p%r@o%r@r%r@t%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@           %u@1%u@2He proceeded to speak to the guests, %r@“%R@W%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@p%r@p%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@l%r@u%r@n%r@c%r@h%r@e%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@b%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@d%r@…%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%R@A%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@b%r@l%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@c%r@a%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@           %u@1%u@5Upon hearing these things, one of the fellow guests said to him, “Blessed be whoever has a meal while a participant in God’s plan (in God’s kingdom).” %u@1%u@6He said to him, %r@“%R@S%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@r%r@e%r@w%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@h%r@u%r@g%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@n%r@n%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@f%r@e%r@a%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@v%r@i%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@y%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@o%r@p%r@l%r@e%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@7%R@A%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@n%r@n%r@e%r@r%r@,%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@r%r@v%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@i%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@v%r@i%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@,%r@%vn~
      %r@“%r@’%R@C%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@y%r@’%r@.%r@”%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@8%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@g%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@x%r@c%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@f%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@.%r@%vn~
      %r@“%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@r%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@i%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@I%r@ %r@b%r@o%r@u%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@e%r@l%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@o%r@k%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@.%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@k%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@x%r@c%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@d%r@.%r@’%r@%vn~
          %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@9%r@”%R@A%r@n%r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@i%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@I%r@ %r@b%r@o%r@u%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@x%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@k%r@e%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@s%r@p%r@e%r@c%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@.%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@k%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@x%r@c%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@d%r@.%r@’%r@%vn~
          %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@0%r@”%R@A%r@n%r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@i%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@I%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@r%r@r%r@i%r@e%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@c%r@a%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@,%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@b%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@.%r@’%r@%vn~
          %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@”%R@A%r@f%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@r%r@o%r@u%r@n%r@d%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@r%r@v%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@           %u@2%u@5Large crowds gathered around him, and he addressed them. %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@6%r@”%R@I%r@f%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %sb~
Luke Chapter 15%hb~
          %u@1All of the tax collectors and the sinners were drawing near to him to listen to what he had to say. %u@2The Pharisees and the designated teachers wouldn’t stop grumbling and complaining, saying that this guy heartily welcomes sinners and dines with them. %u@3He told them this analogy, %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@“%R@D%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@k%r@n%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@y%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@o%r@w%r@n%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@h%r@u%r@n%r@d%r@r%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@h%r@e%r@e%r@p%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@ %r@m%r@i%r@s%r@s%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@,%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@n%r@i%r@n%r@e%r@t%r@y%r@-%r@n%r@i%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@i%r@d%r@d%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@w%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@ %r@a%r@f%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@m%r@i%r@s%r@s%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@o%r@p%r@ %r@u%r@n%r@t%r@i%r@l%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@u%r@c%r@c%r@e%r@e%r@d%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@n%r@d%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@?%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%R@W%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@n%r@d%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@,%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@j%r@o%r@i%r@c%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@u%r@t%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@s%r@h%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@6%R@O%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@e%r@t%r@s%r@           %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%r@”%R@N%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@l%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ Luke Chapter 16%hb~
          %u@1He proceeded to tell something else to the disciples. %r@“%R@A%r@ %r@c%r@e%r@r%r@t%r@a%r@i%r@n%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@r%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@c%r@c%r@o%r@u%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@a%r@g%r@e%r@r%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@c%r@c%r@u%r@s%r@a%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@l%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@g%r@a%r@i%r@n%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@f%r@f%r@e%r@c%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@s%r@q%r@u%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@s%r@t%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@p%r@o%r@s%r@s%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@s%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%R@H%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@i%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@W%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@           %u@1%u@4The money-loving Pharisees were monitoring these things he was saying and sneered at him. %u@1%u@5He said to them, %r@“%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@,%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@w%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@,%r@       %r@“%r@‘%R@P%r@a%r@t%r@r%r@i%r@a%r@r%r@c%r@h%r@ %R@A%r@b%r@r%r@a%r@h%r@a%r@m%r@,%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@r%r@c%r@y%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@n%r@d%r@ %R@L%r@a%r@z%r@a%r@r%r@u%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@p%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@e%r@r%r@t%r@i%r@p%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@o%r@l%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@f%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@n%r@g%r@u%r@e%r@;%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@c%r@a%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@r%r@m%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@l%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@.%r@’%r@%vn~
          %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%r@”%R@A%r@b%r@r%r@a%r@h%r@a%r@m%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@i%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@S%r@o%r@n%r@,%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@m%r@e%r@m%r@b%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@d%r@u%r@r%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@t%r@i%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@r%r@o%r@u%r@g%r@h%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@e%r@n%r@j%r@o%r@y%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@;%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@i%r@m%r@e%r@ %R@L%r@a%r@z%r@a%r@r%r@u%r@s%r@ %r@s%r@u%r@f%r@f%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@.%r@ %R@B%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@f%r@o%r@r%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@;%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@u%r@g%r@h%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@r%r@t%r@u%r@r%r@e%r@d%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@6%R@A%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@h%r@u%r@g%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@h%r@a%r@s%r@m%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@p%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@p%r@l%r@a%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@t%r@w%r@e%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@u%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@,%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@s%r@u%r@l%r@t%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@y%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@c%r@r%r@o%r@s%r@s%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@o%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@d%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@d%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@a%r@b%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@g%r@a%r@i%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@c%r@c%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@d%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@r%r@s%r@.%r@’%r@%vn~

          %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@9%r@”%R@A%r@b%r@r%r@a%r@h%r@a%r@m%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@i%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@B%r@i%r@b%r@l%r@e%r@.%r@ %R@L%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@y%r@s%r@.%r@’%r@%vn~
          %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@0%r@”%R@S%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@i%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@N%r@o%r@,%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@,%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %R@A%r@b%r@r%r@a%r@h%r@a%r@m%r@;%r@ %r@i%r@f%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@a%r@c%r@k%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@’%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@r%r@a%r@i%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@.%r@’%r@%vn~
          %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@”%R@H%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@i%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@I%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@B%r@i%r@b%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@y%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@n%r@e%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@n%r@v%r@i%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@b%r@y%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@a%r@c%r@k%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@.%r@’%r@”%vn~
%sb~
Luke Chapter 17%hb~
          %u@1He said to his disciples, %r@“%R@V%r@a%r@r%r@i%r@o%r@u%r@s%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@a%r@n%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@g%r@e%r@t%r@t%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@i%r@p%r@p%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@t%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@m%r@p%r@o%r@s%r@s%r@i%r@b%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@a%r@v%r@o%r@i%r@d%r@;%r@ %r@n%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@l%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@n%r@e%r@w%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@r%r@o%r@u%r@g%r@h%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%R@H%r@e%r@’%r@d%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@t%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@f%r@ %r@i%r@f%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@m%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@s%r@t%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@i%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@o%r@u%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@n%r@e%r@c%r@k%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@r%r@o%r@w%r@n%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@a%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@i%r@f%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@o%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@s%r@i%r@g%r@n%r@i%r@f%r@i%r@c%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@g%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@i%r@p%r@p%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@t%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@n%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%R@P%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@a%r@t%r@t%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@s%r@e%r@l%r@v%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@(%r@t%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@s%r@e%r@l%r@f%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@)%r@.%r@ %R@I%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@r%r@a%r@d%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@p%r@p%r@e%r@n%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@n%r@,%r@ %r@c%r@h%r@a%r@s%r@t%r@i%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@;%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@f%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@h%r@a%r@n%r@g%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@y%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@g%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%R@A%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@f%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@p%r@p%r@e%r@n%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@g%r@a%r@i%r@n%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@m%r@u%r@l%r@t%r@i%r@p%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@i%r@m%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@a%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@o%r@i%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@e%r@n%r@o%r@u%r@g%r@h%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@e%r@a%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@t%r@i%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@u%r@r%r@n%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@y%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@r%r@r%r@y%r@,%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@p%r@p%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@g%r@a%r@i%r@n%r@,%r@’%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@g%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~
          %u@5The missionaries said to the Lord, “Boost our faith.” %u@6The Lord said, %r@“%R@I%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@m%r@u%r@s%r@t%r@a%r@r%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@o%r@c%r@e%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@m%r@u%r@l%r@b%r@e%r@r%r@r%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@e%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@B%r@e%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@r%r@o%r@o%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@p%r@l%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@a%r@,%r@’%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@b%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@.%r@%vn~
          %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@7%r@”%R@W%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@k%r@n%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@r%r@v%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@…%r@a%r@ %r@j%r@u%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@e%r@l%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@C%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@r%r@a%r@i%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@o%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@a%r@b%r@l%r@e%r@,%r@’%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@8%r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@M%r@a%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@n%r@n%r@e%r@r%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@p%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@i%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@f%r@i%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@i%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@u%r@n%r@t%r@i%r@l%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@p%r@p%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@n%r@i%r@s%r@h%r@ %r@t%r@a%r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@o%r@w%r@n%r@’%r@?%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@9%R@T%r@h%r@o%r@u%r@g%r@h%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@l%r@e%r@a%r@s%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@g%r@h%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@c%r@a%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@d%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@0%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@o%r@,%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@a%r@g%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@,%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@s%r@e%r@l%r@v%r@e%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@W%r@e%r@’%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@e%r@f%r@f%r@e%r@c%r@t%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@n%r@o%r@u%r@g%r@h%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@r%r@v%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@s%r@:%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@’%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@a%r@c%r@c%r@o%r@m%r@p%r@l%r@i%r@s%r@h%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@o%r@k%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@k%r@e%r@p%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@p%r@u%r@t%r@t%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@f%r@.%r@’%r@”%r@%vn~
          %u@1%u@1While on the way to Jerusalem, he reached the point where he was starting to go through the middle of Samaria and Galilee. %u@1%u@2While he was entering a particular town, standing at a distance were ten men who were lepers, and these lepers encountered him. %u@1%u@3They raised their voices in unison, “Jesus, master, have mercy on us.” %u@1%u@4Seeing them, he said, %r@“%R@G%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@h%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@s%r@e%r@l%r@v%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@i%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@s%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@n%r@f%r@i%r@r%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@p%r@r%r@o%r@s%r@y%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@w%r@.%r@”%r@ And it so happened as they were on the way that they were purged of their leprosy. %u@1%u@5But one of them, seeing that he had been healed, returned glorifying God in a loud voice. %u@1%u@6He fell on his face at his feet thanking him. He, though, was a Samaritan. %u@1%u@7Jesus addressed him, %r@“%R@W%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@u%r@r%r@g%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@p%r@r%r@o%r@s%r@y%r@?%r@ %R@W%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@n%r@i%r@n%r@e%r@?%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@8%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@s%r@e%r@l%r@v%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@t%r@u%r@r%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@g%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@l%r@o%r@r%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@e%r@x%r@c%r@e%r@p%r@t%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@n%r@a%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@a%r@l%r@i%r@t%r@y%r@?%r@” %u@1%u@9He said to him, %r@“%R@G%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@y%r@.%r@ %R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@s%r@c%r@u%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~
          %u@2%u@0Asked by the Pharisees when God will roll out his plan for mankind (when God’s kingdom is expected to come), his response was, %r@“%R@G%r@o%r@d%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@d%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@e%r@s%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@c%r@a%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@t%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@w%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@ %r@o%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@n%r@e%r@-%r@t%r@o%r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@b%r@,%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@n%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@s%r@h%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@l%r@k%r@s%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@L%r@o%r@o%r@k%r@ %r@r%r@i%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@o%r@k%r@ %r@o%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@.%r@’%r@ %R@G%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@h%r@o%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@c%r@t%r@:%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@v%r@o%r@l%r@v%r@e%r@m%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@ %r@(%R@G%r@o%r@d%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@d%r@o%r@m%r@)%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@a%r@c%r@h%r@,%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@a%r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~
          %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%R@S%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@s%r@c%r@i%r@p%r@l%r@e%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@“%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@d%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@s%r@i%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@o%r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@a%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@M%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@b%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%R@F%r@o%r@l%r@k%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@L%r@o%r@o%r@k%r@—%r@h%r@e%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@r%r@i%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@,%r@’%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@L%r@o%r@o%r@k%r@—%r@h%r@e%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@’%r@—%R@D%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@d%r@-%r@g%r@o%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@h%r@a%r@s%r@e%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@j%r@u%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@n%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@r%r@i%r@k%r@e%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@f%r@l%r@a%r@s%r@h%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@k%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@M%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@m%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@           %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@6%R@J%r@u%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@p%r@p%r@e%r@n%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@b%r@a%r@c%r@k%r@ %R@L%r@o%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@?%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@i%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@k%r@e%r@e%r@p%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@f%r@t%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@d%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@           %u@3%u@7In response they said to him, “Where will this take place, Lord?”%vn~
      …And he told them, %r@“%R@W%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@r%r@c%r@a%r@s%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@v%r@u%r@l%r@t%r@u%r@r%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@n%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@g%r@e%r@.%r@”%vn~
%sb~
Luke Chapter 18%hb~
          %u@1He proceeded to tell them an analogy, to the effect that men must continuously pray, all the time, and not get tired of praying and give up, %u@2saying, %r@“%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@c%r@e%r@r%r@t%r@a%r@i%r@n%r@ %r@j%r@u%r@d%r@g%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@p%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@i%r@c%r@u%r@l%r@a%r@r%r@ %r@c%r@i%r@t%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@d%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@k%r@n%r@u%r@c%r@k%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@u%r@n%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@y%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%R@N%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@d%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@c%r@i%r@t%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@ %r@o%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@g%r@a%r@i%r@n%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@I%r@s%r@s%r@u%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@v%r@e%r@r%r@d%r@i%r@c%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@v%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@r%r@u%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@g%r@a%r@i%r@n%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@o%r@p%r@p%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@t%r@ %r@l%r@a%r@w%r@.%r@’%r@           %u@1%u@5They kept on bringing the toddlers to him so that he’d affect them by touching them. Seeing this, the disciples scolded them. %u@1%u@6But Jesus called them (the toddlers) over, while saying, %r@“%R@D%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@ %r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@w%r@i%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@n%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@o%r@y%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@g%r@i%r@r%r@l%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@;%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@,%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@a%r@c%r@t%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@s%r@e%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@7%R@R%r@e%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@y%r@,%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@,%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@l%r@e%r@-%r@h%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@e%r@m%r@b%r@r%r@a%r@c%r@e%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@p%r@l%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@a%r@c%r@t%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@k%r@i%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@(%R@G%r@o%r@d%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@d%r@o%r@m%r@)%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@b%r@o%r@y%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@g%r@i%r@r%r@l%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@ %r@s%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@a%r@c%r@c%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@—%r@n%r@o%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@a%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~
          %u@1%u@8One of the rulers asked him,%vn~
      “Good teacher, what do I need to do so that I would be guaranteed to take possession of that special fullness of life (eternal life)?”%vn~
          %u@1%u@9Jesus said, %r@“%R@W%r@h%r@y%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@‘%r@g%r@o%r@o%r@d%r@’%r@?%r@ %R@N%r@o%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@e%r@x%r@c%r@e%r@p%r@t%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@0%R@A%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@m%r@i%r@l%r@i%r@a%r@r%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@m%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@m%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@s%r@:%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@m%r@i%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@d%r@u%r@l%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@;%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@m%r@u%r@r%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@;%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@e%r@a%r@l%r@;%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@k%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@i%r@f%r@y%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@ %r@g%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@p%r@o%r@s%r@i%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@r%r@t%r@;%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@n%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@m%r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@?%r@”%r@%vn~
          %u@2%u@1He said, “These I’ve been vigilant to keep since I was a youth.”%vn~
          %u@2%u@2Jesus heard this and said, %r@“%R@Y%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@i%r@s%r@s%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@i%r@e%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@u%r@z%r@z%r@l%r@e%r@:%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@g%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@o%r@c%r@e%r@e%r@d%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@o%r@o%r@r%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@e%r@a%r@s%r@u%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@p%r@i%r@r%r@i%r@t%r@u%r@a%r@l%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@l%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@s%r@c%r@i%r@p%r@l%r@e%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~
          %u@2%u@3But having heard this, he became sad to the core; for he was exceedingly rich. %u@2%u@4Seeing him become sad, Jesus said, %r@“%R@O%r@h%r@,%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@r%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@a%r@l%r@t%r@h%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@g%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@v%r@o%r@l%r@v%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@(%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@d%r@o%r@m%r@)%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@c%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@e%r@a%r@s%r@i%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@c%r@r%r@o%r@u%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@w%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@c%r@r%r@a%r@w%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@r%r@o%r@u%r@g%r@h%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@s%r@m%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@g%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@o%r@r%r@t%r@a%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@r%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@g%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@v%r@o%r@l%r@v%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %R@H%r@i%r@m%r@.%r@”%r@ %vn~
          %u@2%u@6Those who heard this said, “Just how can anyone avoid this?”%vn~
          %u@2%u@7He said, %r@“%R@T%r@h%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@m%r@p%r@o%r@s%r@s%r@i%r@b%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@o%r@p%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@o%r@s%r@s%r@i%r@b%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~
          %u@2%u@8Peter said, “Consider this: in our case, we left what we owned and became your followers.”%vn~
          %u@2%u@9He said to them, %r@“%R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@c%r@e%r@r%r@t%r@a%r@i%r@n%r@:%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@f%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@r%r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@p%r@a%r@r%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@ %r@c%r@h%r@i%r@l%r@d%r@r%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@h%r@a%r@l%r@f%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@l%r@a%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@s%r@h%r@i%r@p%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@(%R@G%r@o%r@d%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@d%r@o%r@m%r@)%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@0%r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@c%r@e%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@i%r@m%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@m%r@o%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@i%r@m%r@e%r@f%r@r%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@s%r@p%r@e%r@c%r@i%r@a%r@l%r@ %r@f%r@u%r@l%r@l%r@n%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@ %r@(%r@e%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@n%r@a%r@l%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@)%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@C%r@o%r@m%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %R@E%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@n%r@a%r@l%r@ %R@T%r@i%r@m%r@e%r@f%r@r%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@—%r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@c%r@h%r@a%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~
          %u@3%u@1He took the Twelve aside and said to them, %r@“%R@T%r@a%r@k%r@e%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@i%r@c%r@e%r@:%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@w%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %R@J%r@e%r@r%r@u%r@s%r@a%r@l%r@e%r@m%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@r%r@i%r@t%r@t%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@b%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@O%r@l%r@d%r@ %R@T%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@o%r@p%r@h%r@e%r@t%r@s%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@r%r@n%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@M%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@u%r@l%r@f%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@e%r@d%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@t%r@r%r@a%r@y%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@a%r@k%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@t%r@o%r@ %r@c%r@u%r@s%r@t%r@o%r@d%r@y%r@ %r@b%r@y%r@ %R@G%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@i%r@l%r@e%r@s%r@.%r@ %R@T%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@,%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@s%r@u%r@l%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@p%r@i%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@,%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@f%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@g%r@i%r@v%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@f%r@l%r@o%r@g%r@g%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@.%r@ %R@T%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@r%r@d%r@ %r@d%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@a%r@f%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@,%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@s%r@u%r@r%r@r%r@e%r@c%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@.%r@”%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@d%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@u%r@n%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@t%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@y%r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@f%r@o%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@t%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@k%r@e%r@p%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@d%r@d%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@k%r@e%r@p%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@p%r@r%r@e%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@d%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@i%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@a%r@f%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@.%r@%vn~
          %u@3%u@5Now an incident occurred while drawing near to Jericho. On the side of the road a particular blind man was sitting around begging. %u@3%u@6Having heard that a crowd was coming through, he asked repeatedly what it was all about. %u@3%u@7He was told that the Nazarene named Jesus was passing by. %u@3%u@8He began to shout out to Jesus, “You marvelous godsend, have mercy on me!” %u@3%u@9Those from the crowd who passed by scolded him repeatedly, in order to get him to keep quiet. He, though, even more so continued crying out, “You marvelous godsend, have mercy on me.” %u@4%u@0Jesus came to a halt and called to have him sent over to him. He came nearby, and he asked him,%vn~
          %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@”%R@W%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@n%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@?%r@”%r@%vn~
      ”Lord, do whatever it is that you do so that I would gain my sight.”%vn~
          %u@4%u@2Jesus said, %r@“%R@S%r@i%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@:%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@!%r@ %R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@s%r@c%r@u%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~
          %u@4%u@3Immediately he gained his sight and became his follower, all the while glorifying God. Upon seeing this, the entire crowd offered up praise to God.%vn~
%sb~
Luke Chapter 19%hb~
          %u@1He entered Jericho and proceeded to pass through it. %u@2There he was, a man named Zacchaeus. He was employed as a chief tax collector and was rich. %u@3He had been trying to see Jesus, to see who he is, and from the crowd wasn’t able to because he was quite short. %u@4He ran out ahead in front of where the crowd was headed and climbed a sycamore tree so that he could see him, since that oh-so-famous fellow was about to pass through. %u@5As he came to that very spot, Jesus looked up and said to him, %r@“%R@Z%r@a%r@c%r@c%r@h%r@a%r@e%r@u%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@q%r@u%r@i%r@c%r@k%r@—%r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@w%r@n%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@e%r@e%r@.%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@j%r@u%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@a%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@d%r@a%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@.%r@” %u@6He got down in a hurry and greeted him joyfully. %u@7Seeing that everyone was grumbling and complaining, saying that he arrived with a man who’s a sinner to wreak havoc, %u@8Zacchaeus stood up straight and said to the Lord, “Hey, sir: I’m going to give half of what I own to the poor, and anyone I’ve happened to have cheated, I’ll pay back four times the amount.” %u@9Jesus said to him, %r@“%R@T%r@o%r@d%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@m%r@i%r@l%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@e%r@s%r@e%r@r%r@v%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@’%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@u%r@p%r@p%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@c%r@a%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@s%r@c%r@e%r@n%r@d%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %R@A%r@b%r@r%r@a%r@h%r@a%r@m%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@i%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@f%r@o%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %R@A%r@b%r@r%r@a%r@h%r@a%r@m%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@0%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@c%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@t%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@M%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@k%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@s%r@t%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~
          %u@1%u@1While still listening, he added an analogy to what he said, on account of him being near Jerusalem and of them thinking that he was going to bring God’s plan for mankind (God’s kingdom) into view imminently. %u@1%u@2So then he said, %r@“%R@A%r@ %r@p%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@i%r@c%r@u%r@l%r@a%r@r%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@b%r@l%r@e%r@m%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@r%r@-%r@a%r@w%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@p%r@l%r@a%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@a%r@c%r@q%r@u%r@i%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@r%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@d%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@s%r@e%r@l%r@f%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@u%r@r%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@o%r@u%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@ %r@b%r@a%r@c%r@k%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@f%r@u%r@r%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@l%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%R@S%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@u%r@m%r@m%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@r%r@v%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@g%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@ %r@e%r@a%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@$%r@1%r@0%r@,%r@0%r@0%r@0%r@ %r@b%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@i%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@I%r@n%r@v%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@m%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@s%r@i%r@n%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@ %r@v%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@u%r@r%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@l%r@e%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@.%r@’%r@%vn~
          %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@”%R@N%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@r%r@f%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@g%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@s%r@p%r@i%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@?%r@—%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%R@S%r@o%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@a%r@s%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@
