%r@w%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@m%r@a%r@i%r@n%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@a%r@r%r@k%r@n%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@7%R@I%r@f%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@g%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@y%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@g%r@u%r@a%r@r%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@u%r@r%r@p%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@a%r@d%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@,%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@n%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@v%r@e%r@r%r@d%r@i%r@c%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@s%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@d%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@n%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@v%r@e%r@r%r@d%r@i%r@c%r@t%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@l%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@c%r@c%r@o%r@r%r@d%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@y%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@m%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@k%r@i%r@n%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@l%r@d%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@8%R@H%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@n%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@p%r@o%r@i%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@v%r@i%r@e%r@w%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@l%r@e%r@-%r@h%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@e%r@m%r@b%r@r%r@a%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@y%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@v%r@e%r@r%r@d%r@i%r@c%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@s%r@e%r@l%r@f%r@.%r@ %R@T%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@a%r@g%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@s%r@p%r@o%r@k%r@e%r@:%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@n%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@v%r@e%r@r%r@d%r@i%r@c%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@n%r@a%r@l%r@ %r@d%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@i%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@9%R@B%r@e%r@c%r@a%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@d%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@s%r@p%r@e%r@a%r@k%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@o%r@w%r@n%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@l%r@f%r@,%r@ %r@r%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@v%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@—%R@H%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@o%r@n%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@r%r@e%r@c%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@w%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@a%r@l%r@k%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@0%R@A%r@n%r@d%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@k%r@n%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %R@H%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@m%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@m%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@s%r@p%r@e%r@c%r@i%r@a%r@l%r@ %r@f%r@u%r@l%r@l%r@n%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@e%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@n%r@a%r@l%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@.%r@ %R@S%r@o%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@g%r@a%r@r%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@s%r@p%r@e%r@a%r@k%r@:%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@s%r@p%r@e%r@a%r@k%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@c%r@c%r@o%r@r%r@d%r@a%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@s%r@p%r@o%r@k%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~
%sb~
John Chapter 13%hb~
          %u@1Prior to the Passover festival, Jesus had known that the time had arrived for him to depart this world and cross over back to the Father. He loved his own who were in the world, this established order of humans—he loved them until the very end. %u@2The devil had already lodged himself in the heart of Judas son of Simon Iscariot so that he would facilitate his arrest, while a dinner was taking place; %u@3Jesus knew that the Father had placed all matters under his control and knew that he had previously departed from God and now is heading back to God. %u@4Getting up from the dinner table, he then takes off his outer garments, took a towel and wrapped it around himself. %u@5He then puts some water in a wash basin and begins to wash the disciples’ feet and wipe them dry with the towel which was wrapped around him. %u@6So he comes to Simon Peter. He then says to him,%vn~
      “Lord, you’re going to wash my feet, now are you?”%vn~
          %u@7Jesus’s response was, %r@“%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@u%r@n%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@t%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@r%r@i%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@w%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@f%r@i%r@g%r@u%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@o%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~
          %u@8Peter then says, “Don’t you ever wash my feet—ever.”%vn~
      Jesus answered, %r@“%R@I%r@f%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@g%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@s%r@h%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@,%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@p%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@n%r@e%r@r%r@-%r@c%r@i%r@r%r@c%r@l%r@e%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~
       %u@9Simon Peter then tells him, “Lord, don’t just do my feet but do the hands and head too.”%vn~
          %u@1%u@0Jesus then says, %r@“%R@H%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@b%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@e%r@s%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@n%r@e%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@y%r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@e%r@l%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@s%r@h%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@e%r@x%r@c%r@e%r@p%r@t%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@e%r@e%r@t%r@;%r@ %r@a%r@p%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@,%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@c%r@l%r@e%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@o%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@.%r@ %R@A%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@l%r@e%r@a%r@n%r@…%r@a%r@c%r@t%r@u%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@,%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@.%r@” %u@1%u@1You see, he knew the one who was facilitating his arrest; this is the reason he said that not all of you all are clean.%vn~
          %u@1%u@2When he’d finished washing their feet, he put his outer garments back on, sat back down at the table, and told them, %r@“%R@D%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@u%r@n%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@t%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@?%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@a%r@d%r@d%r@r%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@ %r@‘%R@T%r@e%r@a%r@c%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@’%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@‘%R@L%r@o%r@r%r@d%r@,%r@’%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@s%r@p%r@e%r@a%r@k%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@o%r@p%r@e%r@r%r@l%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@a%r@m%r@ %R@T%r@e%r@a%r@c%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %R@L%r@o%r@r%r@d%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%R@S%r@o%r@ %r@i%r@f%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@s%r@h%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@f%r@e%r@e%r@t%r@—%r@m%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %R@L%r@o%r@r%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %R@T%r@e%r@a%r@c%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@—%r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@o%r@ %r@o%r@u%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@s%r@h%r@ %r@e%r@a%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@e%r@e%r@t%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@,%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@f%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@ %r@e%r@x%r@a%r@m%r@p%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@o%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@c%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@n%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@d%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@6%R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@-%r@t%r@o%r@-%r@g%r@o%r@o%r@d%r@n%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@u%r@t%r@h%r@,%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@a%r@m%r@:%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@r%r@v%r@a%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@s%r@u%r@p%r@e%r@r%r@i%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@o%r@s%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@ %r@e%r@m%r@i%r@s%r@s%r@a%r@r%r@y%r@ %r@s%r@u%r@p%r@e%r@r%r@i%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@7%R@I%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@k%r@n%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@l%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@8%R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@a%r@l%r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@a%r@b%r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@.%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@k%r@n%r@o%r@w%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@c%r@h%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@s%r@c%r@i%r@p%r@l%r@e%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@i%r@d%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@v%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %R@S%r@c%r@r%r@i%r@p%r@t%r@u%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@u%r@l%r@f%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@e%r@d%r@,%r@%vn~
%r@%si~
%r@“%R@H%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@n%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@f%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@o%r@w%r@s%r@h%r@i%r@p%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@t%r@t%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@%vp~
%R@L%r@i%r@f%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@e%r@l%r@ %r@o%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@p%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@o%r@m%r@p%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@%vp~
%r@%si~
          %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@9%r@”%R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@r%r@i%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@f%r@o%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@p%r@p%r@e%r@n%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@d%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@p%r@p%r@e%r@n%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@a%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@O%r@n%r@e%r@-%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@-%R@O%r@n%r@l%r@y%r@-%R@O%r@n%r@e%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@0%R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@-%r@t%r@o%r@-%r@g%r@o%r@o%r@d%r@n%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@u%r@t%r@h%r@,%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@a%r@m%r@:%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@c%r@e%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@(%r@i%r@.%r@e%r@.%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@l%r@e%r@-%r@h%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@e%r@m%r@b%r@r%r@a%r@c%r@e%r@s%r@)%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@c%r@e%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@.%r@ %R@H%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@c%r@e%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@c%r@e%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@O%r@n%r@e%r@ %R@W%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~
          %u@2%u@1Having said these things, Jesus was troubled in spirit and went on record to say, “I’m telling you the honest-to-goodness truth, I really am: one of you is going to betray me and facilitate my arrest.” %u@2%u@2The disciples began looking at one another perplexed at what he was talking about. %u@2%u@3One of his disciples, whom Jesus loved and loved, was seated next to him, and since he was a close companion was in physical contact with him, leaning against him. %u@2%u@4So Simon Peter nods at this fellow to ask whom he might be talking about. %u@2%u@5That fellow leaned in closer to Jesus, putting his head right next to Jesus’s head, and then says to him, “Lord, who is it?” %u@2%u@6Jesus replied, %r@“%R@T%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@m%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@r%r@i%r@t%r@u%r@a%r@l%r@i%r@s%r@t%r@i%r@c%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@(%r@s%r@i%r@g%r@n%r@i%r@f%r@y%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@i%r@e%r@n%r@d%r@s%r@h%r@i%r@p%r@)%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@p%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@s%r@m%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@s%r@l%r@i%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@b%r@r%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@o%r@l%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@i%r@l%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@g%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@—%r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@u%r@y%r@.%r@” So he dipped the slice, takes it, and gives it to Judas son of Simon Iscariot. %u@2%u@7Right after giving it to him, Satan entered into that guy. Jesus then says to him, %r@“%R@W%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@,%r@ %r@g%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@—%r@q%r@u%r@i%r@c%r@k%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@w%r@.%r@”%vn~
          %u@2%u@8Now no one who was seated around the table knew to what end he told him this. %u@2%u@9Truth be known, some of them surmised, “Since Judas is in charge of the purse, Jesus is telling him to go buy what we’re missing for the festival or that he should donate something to the needy.” %u@3%u@0So that guy received the slice of bread and departed poste-haste; and it was night.%vn~
          %u@3%u@1So when he had departed, Jesus then says, %r@“%R@A%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@i%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@M%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@g%r@l%r@o%r@r%r@i%r@f%r@i%r@e%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@g%r@l%r@o%r@r%r@i%r@f%r@i%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@,%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@g%r@l%r@o%r@r%r@i%r@f%r@y%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %R@H%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@g%r@l%r@o%r@r%r@i%r@f%r@y%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@r%r@a%r@i%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@a%r@w%r@a%r@y%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%R@F%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@a%r@s%r@,%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@t%r@t%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@n%r@g%r@e%r@r%r@.%r@ %R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@o%r@k%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@j%r@u%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@k%r@e%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@J%r@u%r@d%r@e%r@a%r@n%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@W%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@e%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@’%r@;%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@w%r@,%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@g%r@i%r@v%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@b%r@r%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@-%r@n%r@e%r@w%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@r%r@e%r@c%r@t%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@;%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@n%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@v%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@o%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@a%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@y%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%R@T%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@a%r@n%r@s%r@ %r@b%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@c%r@o%r@g%r@n%r@i%r@z%r@e%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@u%r@n%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@t%r@o%r@o%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@k%r@n%r@o%r@w%r@n%r@ %r@b%r@y%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@,%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@s%r@c%r@i%r@p%r@l%r@e%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@i%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@o%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~
          %u@3%u@6Simon Peter then says to him, “Lord, where are you headed?”%vn~
      Jesus replied, %r@“%R@W%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@l%r@l%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@w%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@l%r@l%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@t%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@l%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@i%r@m%r@e%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~
          %u@3%u@7Peter then says, “Lord, why can’t I follow you now? I’d put my life on the line for you.”%vn~
          %u@3%u@8Jesus then replies, %r@“%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@d%r@ %r@p%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@?%r@—%R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@-%r@t%r@o%r@-%r@g%r@o%r@o%r@d%r@n%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@u%r@t%r@h%r@,%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@a%r@m%r@:%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@s%r@o%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@r%r@o%r@o%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@c%r@r%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@u%r@n%r@t%r@i%r@l%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@n%r@y%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@r%r@e%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@i%r@m%r@e%r@s%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~
%sb~
John Chapter 14%hb~
          %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@”%R@D%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@o%r@u%r@b%r@l%r@e%r@d%r@:%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%R@O%r@n%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@e%r@s%r@t%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@y%r@ %r@a%r@p%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@m%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@s%r@.%r@ %R@N%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@i%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@s%r@e%r@,%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@’%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@c%r@a%r@u%r@s%r@e%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@o%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@e%r@p%r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@p%r@l%r@a%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%R@A%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@f%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@a%r@g%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@e%r@p%r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@p%r@l%r@a%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@—%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@—%R@I%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@a%r@c%r@k%r@ %r@a%r@g%r@a%r@i%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@l%r@l%r@e%r@c%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@k%r@e%r@e%r@p%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@b%r@y%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@d%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@a%r@m%r@,%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@o%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%R@A%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@e%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@k%r@n%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@y%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~
          %u@5Thomas then says to him, “Lord, we don’t know where you’re headed; how can we know the way?” %u@6Jesus then says, %r@“%R@I%r@ %r@a%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@W%r@a%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@T%r@r%r@u%r@t%r@h%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@L%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@.%r@ %R@N%r@o%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@e%r@x%r@c%r@e%r@p%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@r%r@o%r@u%r@g%r@h%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@7%R@I%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@k%r@n%r@o%r@w%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@u%r@n%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@t%r@o%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@k%r@n%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@u%r@n%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@t%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@o%r@.%r@ %R@S%r@t%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@w%r@,%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@k%r@n%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@u%r@n%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@t%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %R@H%r@i%r@m%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@n%r@ %R@H%r@i%r@m%r@.%r@” %u@8Philip then says to him, “Lord, show us the Father this once, and that’ll be good enough.” %u@9Jesus then says, %r@“%R@I%r@’%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@s%r@u%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@i%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@w%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@a%r@c%r@h%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@o%r@i%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@k%r@n%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@u%r@n%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@t%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@,%r@ %R@P%r@h%r@i%r@l%r@i%r@p%r@?%r@ %R@H%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@.%r@ %R@H%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@n%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@‘%R@S%r@h%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@u%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@’%r@?%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@0%R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@l%r@i%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@?%r@ %R@T%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@a%r@g%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@s%r@p%r@e%r@a%r@k%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@s%r@e%r@l%r@f%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@d%r@w%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@e%r@s%r@ %R@H%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@u%r@f%r@f%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%R@B%r@e%r@l%r@i%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@:%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@.%r@ %R@I%r@f%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@l%r@i%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@c%r@c%r@o%r@u%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@v%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@k%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@-%r@t%r@o%r@-%r@g%r@o%r@o%r@d%r@n%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@u%r@t%r@h%r@,%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@a%r@m%r@:%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@l%r@i%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@k%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@—%r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@—%r@b%r@e%r@t%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@—%r@s%r@i%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%R@A%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@p%r@p%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@k%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@p%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@i%r@c%r@u%r@l%r@a%r@r%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@c%r@t%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@l%r@e%r@g%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@u%r@t%r@h%r@o%r@r%r@i%r@t%r@y%r@,%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@,%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@l%r@o%r@r%r@i%r@f%r@i%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@b%r@y%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@a%r@n%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@S%r@o%r@n%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%R@L%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@p%r@e%r@a%r@t%r@—%R@I%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@k%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@c%r@t%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@l%r@e%r@g%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@u%r@t%r@h%r@o%r@r%r@i%r@t%r@y%r@,%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@.%r@%vn~
          %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%r@”%R@I%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@v%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@k%r@e%r@e%r@p%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@m%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@m%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@s%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@6%R@I%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@k%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@g%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@l%r@p%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@f%r@f%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@k%r@i%r@n%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@k%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@f%r@o%r@r%r@t%r@s%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %R@H%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@g%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@,%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@1%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@7%r@n%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@S%r@p%r@i%r@r%r@i%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %R@T%r@r%r@u%r@t%r@h%r@,%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@l%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@s%r@t%r@a%r@b%r@l%r@i%r@s%r@h%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@h%r@u%r@m%r@a%r@n%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@n%r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@g%r@e%r@t%r@,%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@t%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@e%r@s%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@y%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@d%r@i%r@c%r@a%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@s%r@           %u@2%u@2Judas (not Iscariot) then says to him, “Lord, how has it turned out that you intend to manifest yourself to us and not to the world?” %u@2%u@3Jesus thought it over and said, %r@“%R@I%r@f%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@k%r@e%r@e%r@p%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@s%r@y%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@m%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@u%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@m%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@s%r@h%r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@p%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@m%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%R@H%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@e%r@s%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@k%r@e%r@e%r@p%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@s%r@y%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@m%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@u%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@.%r@ %R@A%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@y%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@m%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@u%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@r%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@d%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@i%r@g%r@i%r@n%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@.%r@%vn~
          %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%r@”%R@I%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@p%r@o%r@k%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@0%R@I%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@n%r@’%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@ %r@l%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@a%r@l%r@k%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@a%r@b%r@o%r@u%r@t%r@           %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@6%r@”%R@W%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@H%r@e%r@l%r@p%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@e%r@s%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@m%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@S%r@p%r@i%r@r%r@i%r@t%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %R@T%r@r%r@u%r@t%r@h%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@ %r@p%r@r%r@o%r@c%r@e%r@e%r@d%r@s%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@c%r@l%r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@b%r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@c%r@o%r@r%r@d%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@7%R@A%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@o%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@g%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@c%r@l%r@a%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@b%r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@c%r@o%r@r%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@d%r@a%r@y%r@-%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~

          %u@1%u@7So various disciples of his said to one another, “What’s this he’s telling us, ’In a bit you’ll no longer be able to look at me, and a bit after that you’ll see me,’ and, that %r@‘%R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@a%r@d%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@’?” %u@1%u@8They kept on saying, “What’s this ‘in a bit’?—We don’t know what he’s talking about.” %u@1%u@9Jesus understood that they were wanting to ask him about it, and he said, %r@“%R@I%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@a%r@s%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@r%r@e%r@           %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%r@”%R@I%r@’%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@p%r@o%r@k%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@a%r@b%r@o%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@6%R@W%r@h%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@d%r@a%r@y%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@r%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@a%r@c%r@t%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@l%r@e%r@g%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@u%r@t%r@h%r@o%r@r%r@i%r@t%r@y%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@k%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@e%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@o%r@n%r@a%r@l%r@l%r@y%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@k%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@g%r@a%r@r%r@d%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@;%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@7%r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %R@I%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@l%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@s%r@t%r@a%r@b%r@l%r@i%r@s%r@h%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@h%r@u%r@m%r@a%r@n%r@s%r@.%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@a%r@v%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@l%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@t%r@t%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@i%r@r%r@ %r@o%r@w%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@a%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@m%r@ %r@g%r@o%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~
          %u@2%u@9His disciples then say, “Hey, you’re speaking plainly now, not explaining things by way of analogy. %u@3%u@0At this time we know that you know everything, and there’s no need for anyone to ask you the meaning of any analogy. This is the reason we believe that you came from God.” %u@3%u@1Jesus replied, %r@“%R@N%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@l%r@i%r@e%r@v%r@e%r@?%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%R@L%r@o%r@o%r@k%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@—%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@i%r@m%r@e%r@’%r@s%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@f%r@a%r@c%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@r%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@e%r@a%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@e%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@i%r@s%r@p%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@e%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@t%r@r%r@e%r@a%r@t%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@h%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@w%r@n%r@.%r@ %R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@l%r@e%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@y%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@s%r@e%r@l%r@f%r@.%r@ %R@B%r@u%r@t%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@m%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@o%r@n%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@s%r@i%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%R@I%r@’%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@p%r@o%r@k%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@a%r@c%r@e%r@.%r@ %R@I%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@l%r@d%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@s%r@t%r@a%r@b%r@l%r@i%r@s%r@h%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@o%r@r%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@h%r@u%r@m%r@a%r@n%r@s%r@,%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@r%r@i%r@b%r@u%r@l%r@a%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@,%r@ %r@b%r@u%r@t%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@r%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@w%r@:%r@ %R@I%r@’%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@d%r@e%r@f%r@e%r@a%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@l%r@d%r@.%r@”%r@%vn~
%sb~
John Chapter 17%hb~
          %u@1Jesus said these things then lifted his eyes up to the sky, to where heaven is, and said, %r@“%R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@,%r@ %r@m%r@y%r@ %r@t%r@i%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@s%r@ %r@a%r@r%r@r%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@d%r@.%r@ %R@G%r@l%r@o%r@r%r@i%r@f%r@y%r@ %R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@g%r@l%r@o%r@r%r@i%r@f%r@y%r@ %R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@,%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@2%r@j%r@u%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@a%r@s%r@ %R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@ %r@a%r@u%r@t%r@h%r@o%r@r%r@i%r@t%r@y%r@ %r@o%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@ %r@i%r@m%r@a%r@g%r@i%r@n%r@a%r@b%r@l%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@,%r@ %r@s%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@g%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@s%r@p%r@e%r@c%r@i%r@a%r@l%r@ %r@f%r@u%r@l%r@l%r@n%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@e%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@n%r@a%r@l%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@a%r@l%r@l%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@’%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@g%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@h%r@i%r@m%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@3%R@E%r@t%r@e%r@r%r@n%r@a%r@l%r@ %r@l%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@s%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@:%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@u%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@k%r@n%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@u%r@n%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@t%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@O%r@n%r@l%r@y%r@ %R@T%r@r%r@u%r@e%r@ %R@G%r@o%r@d%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %R@J%r@e%r@s%r@u%r@s%r@ %R@C%r@h%r@r%r@i%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %R@M%r@e%r@s%r@s%r@i%r@a%r@h%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@o%r@m%r@ %R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@s%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@4%R@I%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@l%r@o%r@r%r@i%r@f%r@i%r@e%r@d%r@ %R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@u%r@p%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@e%r@a%r@r%r@t%r@h%r@,%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@p%r@l%r@e%r@t%r@e%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@k%r@s%r@ %R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@d%r@o%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@5%R@A%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@j%r@u%r@n%r@c%r@t%r@u%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@i%r@m%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@g%r@l%r@o%r@r%r@i%r@f%r@y%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@i%r@s%r@ %r@o%r@n%r@c%r@e%r@,%r@ %R@F%r@a%r@t%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@,%r@ %r@u%r@s%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@h%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@n%r@t%r@ %r@g%r@l%r@o%r@r%r@y%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@l%r@o%r@r%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@,%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@l%r@o%r@r%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@h%r@i%r@c%r@h%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@d%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@f%r@o%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@l%r@d%r@ %r@c%r@a%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@t%r@o%r@ %r@b%r@e%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@.%r@%vn~
          %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@6%r@”%R@I%r@’%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@d%r@e%r@ %R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@r%r@e%r@p%r@u%r@t%r@a%r@t%r@i%r@o%r@n%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@s%r@t%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@f%r@o%r@r%r@ %r@m%r@a%r@n%r@i%r@f%r@e%r@s%r@t%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@p%r@e%r@o%r@p%r@l%r@e%r@ %R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@ %r@f%r@r%r@o%r@m%r@ %r@a%r@m%r@o%r@n%r@g%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@s%r@e%r@ %r@i%r@n%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@o%r@r%r@l%r@d%r@.%r@ %R@T%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@w%r@e%r@r%r@e%r@ %r@w%r@i%r@t%r@h%r@ %R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@ %r@g%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@m%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@m%r@e%r@,%r@ %r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@ %r@h%r@a%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@k%r@e%r@p%r@t%r@ %R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@r%r@ %r@s%r@y%r@s%r@t%r@e%r@m%r@ %r@o%r@f%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@o%r@u%r@g%r@h%r@t%r@.%r@ %r@%%r@u%r@@%r@7%R@B%r@y%r@ %r@n%r@o%r@w%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@e%r@y%r@’%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@c%r@o%r@m%r@e%r@ %r@t%r@o%r@ %r@u%r@n%r@d%r@e%r@r%r@s%r@t%r@a%r@n%r@d%r@ %r@t%r@h%r@a%r@t%r@ %r@e%r@v%r@e%r@r%r@y%r@t%r@h%r@i%r@n%r@g%r@ %R@Y%r@o%r@u%r@’%r@v%r@e%r@ %r@g%r@i%r@v%r@e%r@n%r@
